column4: Amazing place for delicious meat cravers,went for the mixed platter to try them all and it was exquisite! Definitely recommended,staff was so friendly and service was amazing

The beef tenderloin was so good that I went back 3 times all in December. I got the big one with vegetables and they were fantastic. The staff, including the chefs, were all so friendly. I'll go back next year for sure. Thanks, everybody!!!
i visited with some friends while on a holiday in Amsterdam and was far from disappointed. The food, service and ambience were absolutely amazing! Make sure you try the homemade Sangria!
The restaurant was lovely. The service was quick and friendly. The food was delicious and good portions. The decor is nice and the place has a cosy atmosphere.
A nice restaurant with a cozy atmosphere. Good service and delicious food. We recommend the Argentinian beef tenderloinüëå
Amazing beef steak Argentina. Nice restaurant . Nice pictures. I will come back again on next year. X
The food was absolutely amazing and delicious. Large portions. Wine was excellent. A must if you are in Amsterdam. Would definitely go again!
Nice meat, nice wine, nice music, nice people. üëç It is always full as I heard so reservation is a must.
Authentic and very nice atmosphere in a relatively small but comfortable environment. Argentinian steak with baked potato was superb. Truly recommended!!
Our 2nd time here and it was as good as the first time. Steak perfectly cooked and great atmosphere with a guy playing on guitar and singing. Will be back next time.
All four of the steaks were absolutely delicious and the atmosphere was warm. The staff was honest and very helpful with food allergies. We had a great time. Thank you!

Did my research via trip advisor and this place did not disappoint We had the mixed grill and there was plenty of really good meat cooked to perfection Waiters were very attentive and knowledgeable Really recommend a visit when visiting Amsterdam

column3: Best real Argentinian Restaurant in Amsterdam
column4: It is a great place to eat good meat and drink good wine. Staff is really nice and the relations quality/price is fair
It has the perfect combination of food, music and nice service for a decent price. Also well located in a calm and beautiful area of the city.
Very good steak in a great laid back atmosphere. Pretty authentic and excellent value for money considering quality of meat
Pure Argentinean meats in a nice place and with a very kind staff!Highly recommended if you visit Amsterdam city!
Very very good mixture of meats offered. We were very satisfied with service provided. Well done and keep it up

column3: Great Find - in a wonderful neighborhood
column4: Wandering the Jordaan neighborhood and found this cool restaurant. Agree with the reviews below - solid food, friendly staff and cozy seating (inside and outside). Would recommend.
Great steak, great wine and in a cozy intimate setting. Would recommend booking, as spaces are in short supply! Friendly service too, thoroughly enjoyed our evening here.
We went here after recommendation from a friend. Perfect after visiting the wonderful Amsterdam. Had the best steak ever. Clean, quaint and wonderful staff.
Enjoyed a delicious steak this afternoon. Nice atmosphere, and liked the bread to start. Good house wine.

Went last night for a birthday meal whilst on holiday! Everyone‚Äôs meals were excellent (especially the steak!) and the staff were all extremely friendly and helpful! I would certainly recommend and hopefully visit again! Thank you for a wonderful evening.

column3: A taste of South America in Amsterdam.
column4: Absolutely delicious food, great ambiance and service. A taste of South America right in Amsterdam!!

Came here with my other half whilst in Amsterdam. Thought the food and service was great. Only criticism was the lack of variety on the starters, could do with prawns, shrimps, lamb chops or something like that. All in all great meal though

A great find in Amsterdam. 20 min tram ride from our hotel but well worth it. Great steak, lovely wine and friendly service. Would absolutely recommend a trip away from the centre to try out this little gem!

Lovely small restaurant with Fantastic South American Beef. Great informal cosy place with good service and soothing romantic guitarist. Book well in advance due to popularity. A top night in the heart of Amsterdam.
Great night with friends. Lovely ambience and friendly staff. Thank you for the lovely steak and wine ‚≠êÔ∏è
Good food, great service and a warm atmosphere. Thoroughly enjoyed. We had the Argentinian orange cake for dessert it was the bomb.
Very delicious meet , very fresh and tender . Would like to come back soon. We had couple plate it's very big dish
A delicious moment in this restaurant. Very very very good meals and professional service. Perfect moment !
Service was good,we visited with friends,delicious meat and sides.Comfortable to spending time there.

The service was beyond friendly and helpful. The steak was juicy and tender, and came in generous portions! The salads were also delicious. Luna is an incredible, delightful and comfortable place to eat.
It was our third time in Amsterdam but first in Luna Restaurant. We wanted an argentinian one. We made phone reservation. Very polite staff and excellent food

Other reviews for Argentino Luna don‚Äôt lie - it really is sooooo good! Great service, amazing food, a delicious bottle of Malbec....you‚Äôve probably guessed that I am really recommending this place! Well worth a visit - probably best to make a reservation üêÇüç∑üëçüèª
Excellent food, very nice steak and an amazing service. The price is affordable and the vibes are family like.
Really nice restaurant with a great atmosphere. Had one of the best steaks I have ever tasted. Excellent

Shared a mix for 2, could have been for 3-4 peoplr! Meat from different south american countries. Good, good service, nice environment. Actually, a troubadour just beside us, entertained while we could keep the conversation going. Will recommend for others .
Such an amazing place with its delicious steaks and sides. Recommend all the steak lovers in Amsterdam
We came as a family with 2 young babies and the staff was really friendly and helpful, but most importantly the food was excellent!
One of the most tender Argentinian meet I ever eat!!!! On top of that, very nice personnel. I recommend it.
Love it. Love the steak and the red wine. Nice simple cozy setup, live music to get you into good an relaxed mood. Definately worth the walk üòä

Found the restaurant thought TripAdvisor. What a wonderful and charming little place. Food was great and service great. A little off the beaten track and tucked down a residential street but found it ok. Would recommend.

column3: Best steak so far in Amsterdam
column4: Super cozy resturant. Steaks were perfect, the personal looked after us and took care of us in a super way. Never long to wait to get new drinks. We visited on a Friday evening and there was live music as well.
Called by phone when found on TA booked us in for 10 min time at 19.30. Really friendly cozy place with great steaks and atmosphere.
They have really good steak and staff so friendly if u looking for steak place this one the best one in Amsterdam I think don‚Äôt forget the take blue cheese sauce ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüòçü•Ç
Great people and food. wonderful atmosphere great service. location was very relaxed and comfortable
Charming service and neighborhood. Amazing steak cooked perfectly and a lovely selection of Argentinian wines. A beautiful evening. I highly recommend.
We went two times and food is great. Great quality and they bring the meat from Argentina and Brazil. The staff is very friendly. I highly recommend it if you want to eat very good meat.
Great Argentinian steaks and if You have a seat outside nice place. Service is ok but long wait, empty glasses stay on the table. All other food we order outside steak was bellow standard.
Tasty Argentinian steaks, well prepared and served. Kind waiter and team. The meal was simple without any fancy adding and this made it so extra!
This restaurant is all about steak. I had the tender loin argentina steak which was cooked to perfection. Higly recommended,i will definatly come back later.
We had the beef mix of 4 steaks and each was as increadible as the last. The most tender steak I have ever had. The staff were lovely but you need to book in advance to avoid disappointment !

Had a huge and perfectly cooked ribeye from Argentina. Everything top quality, and so much better than those touristic steak places you can find all over Amsterdam. Casual atmosphere. Friendly service. Will definitely come back with friends.
Very good and authentic Argentina food. Steak is truly top notch and other items like cheese and chorizo are great

An informal and cosy restaurant. We had steak and whole grilled fish, both really good. The restaurant is slightly away from the most trafficated tourist streets, but a short walk from Central station. Charming and reasonably priced.
I;m from Argentina, and living in Amsterdam makes me miss my home country food and Luna has very good Argentinian food, meat is excellent.
nice little place with cozy atmosphere and you can sit outside also. Steaks came cooked as ordered. You cant be disappointed by choosing this place. Rating is justified.

column3: Really tender and great tasting steak!
column4: The kitchen managed to prepare the meat to perfection, even though we were nine persons that all had individual preferances. Great service. Truly recommended!
Good argertinian cuisine, serving excellent steaks, warmly welcome from the staff. A place where I will come back.
This was a surprisingly authentic experience The food was great - from soup to apps to meats all awesome The service was very good and attentive
Very straightforward tasty and thoroughly enjoyable meal complimented by excellent service. I wouldn't hesitate to return.

Was looking for a good steak in Amsterdam and Luna exceeded all expectations. 300g beef tenderloin cooked to perfection, with a lovely Malbec. Attentive friendly service from the the waitress‚Äôs in a nice atmosphere. Definitely recommend!

column3: Very good dishes and a service with a smile...
column4: We jumped in the restaurant in the saturday evening without a reservation...however, a very polite and accomodating manager managed to offer us a table and served us some really good steaks...anyhow, very friendly service and good good food. Thumbs up!
Excellent food with a warm and cozy atmosphere. Service was fantastic. Would love to come back in the summer.

column3: Excellent to eat really good meat
column4: Great atmosphere, small place but cozy, excellent meat. We did the reservation with the Fork app (nederland one).
excellent food the best restaurant argentino in Amsterdam !!! People are real nice !! 5/5 See you on my next holiday in AMsterdam !!

Make a reservation, because it can be very busy! The service is excellent and the starters are fine but the Argentinian Steak is unbelievably great, a real authentic Argentinian Steakhouse. Very nice staff on December 28, young guy.
Authentic Argentinian Steakhouse with the best meat I have eaten in Europe! Thank you for the great meal
Excellent meat and servings recommend to visit in Amster nice plate of different meat best to choose medium rare
The food is wonderful the service is exceptional in the center of Amsterdam and real Argentinian atmosphere.

column3: Limited winemenu, but very good meat.
column4: This restaurant lacked bit of atmosphere. I never really got ARGENTINIAN. The menu and the meat really got argentinian though. The meat was perfectly the way I wanted it. Big portions even when they give you an option to choose the size of the steak.
We had dinner and it was juat wonderful, the first &main diahes and the service was very good. The antrecote was perfect.

Awesome quality, the meat was next to raw and still extremly tender. Price was 48,50‚Ç¨ for 2 parrilladas, 2 portions of bread, vegetables, 4 sauces (chimichurri, rockefort, mashrooms, smth else) and baked potatoe..
Really nice food and especially meat! I just think the place has more tables than it should do it wasn‚Äôt that spacious.
This cosy restaurant is very nice. The meat in the menu is just delicious ! Well cooked and served !

column3: As always, best steak , wine and atmosphere
column4: We visited twice this restaurant in our last trip. The food, from the empanadas to the steak and desserts are amazing. The wine was great. The atmosphere in this little place is unique. Looking forward to our next trip to Amsterdam to visit Luna again.
Been there once and loved their food . They have amazing steak . We had steak with Malbec wine and it was out of the world . Well done guys
A lively and lovely little restaurant with good food and good wine. Steak was superb. Good value for money.
Went for mixed limo steaks. Side dishes and sauces included were great. If you enjoy steak, this is the place to go!

column3: Delicious food in a lovely neighborhood
column4: We had a delightful, delicious, authentic Argentinian meal at this small, fine restaurant in Amsterdam. The service was wonderful and the location in the Jordaan district just added to a lovely evening out.

Smallish in size, reservations would be best. Number of steak cuts to choose from. Several of us had the multiple filet dish ( made for two). It included a filet from Argentina, Uruguay, Brazil and Netherlands.
Well worth a visit as the steak was superb.. Please make sure you book as this place was busy even on a Tuesday. Had the ‚Äúbeef mix for 2‚Äù - Devine!
We found this restaurant via recommendations here in the internet, and we were glad to find that we made a good decision in choosing an excellent restaurant. Excellent meet. Very tasty chimichuri.

We dinned here twice in out 5 days trip to Amsterdam. The food exedeed our expectations. Fare prices, excellent service. We also loved the wine, red argentinian wine. If you are in town, you should eat here.
Luna is always a great place to eat when in Amsterdam!! Food and atmosphere is always brilliant. Took seven friends who all love led the place and been back!
The food was very good for meat lovers. You need to check the cooking though as the rib eye of my son was too cooked! David the colombian waiter was perfect.

This is a very calm little restaurant near the center of Amsterdam. A great atmosphere for two lovers. Excellent steak and salad for a true price. Book a table in advance in order to spend a good evening.
Great steaks, good atmosphere and very friendly staff. Would definitely return and also recommend a visit.
Seen this on trip advisor so thought we would dine there. So glad we did. We had a three course and every dish was beautiful. Better than any steak I have had.

This is one of those meals you won't one to end! Excellent, tasty steak, with attentive service that wasn't intrusive. It's a small restaurant that's big on atmosphere in a quiet backwater of Amsterdam.

column3: A great place for meat lovers
column4: We had dinner, a family of 5. Portions are big, the Argentinian meat is of good quality and the side dishes are tasty. Prices are reasonable, not cheap but good value for money
Small argentinian restaurant. Meat quality is just great. We had argentinian filet 200 and 300 gramms. The meat was nice. Service is friendly.
The best steak house we visited, the meat is delicious, the ambiance is cosy with Argentina touch , ideal for a romantic evening. The price are reasonable for the quality of food
This is the key, know what you want before you order, The meat her is spacial and delicious just think what you like... service is amazing. Atmosphere is good, out and in door seating.
We took meat and wine (suggested by the owner), really happy, everything was delicious. For sure I will come again

Staff exceptional, food perfect, wine fabulous, enjoyed it that much on the Friday I went back on the Saturday with more friends. They were disappointed that they only visited the once. I will be visiting again.
Well worth a visit. Don't waste your time on other "Argentinian" restaurants because nothing will come close to this one.
No mistakes and no compromises. The best steak in Amsterdam city. After one long walking day I've been rewarded: 300 grams of perfect meat ! Please think on that: you apetite will be satisfied !
We ate here Monday night and the steak was one of the best we've had. Service was 1st class also. Definitely recommend going if you visit Amsterdam.

Really friendly staff who care about their customers. large portions, really large! definately a locals hangout, really busy even on a Monday night, arrive hungry and leave full. Reasonable prices for drink and food
Everything perfect, really good meat (tasty and tender), good argentinian wine and nice waiter! You have to Check this restaurant! Thank you

column3: One of the best steaks in town!
column4: I come to Amsterdam frequently and so U know a lot of good steakhouses. This time I wanted to try a new one and what a found!! Superb steaks , very friendly service and warm atmosphere. Absolutely and warmly recommeded!

Excelent attendance, great interior, cozy, music, emvoironment everything worth the price. They have a lot of types of beef and very good choices of wines and drinks. We ordered the Uruguayan Lomo with potatoes...the best we tried in Amsterdam! Definitely well recomended.
The food was amazing. We had the best steaks ever there. Argentinian beef cooked as you like(medium rare) by french chefs.
Really enjoyed our dinner at Argentina Luna. Very generous portions, great steaks, lovely wines and great service too. Highly Recommend

column3: Amazing steak and a great atmosphere
column4: We enjoyed some magnificent steak and fabulous Malbec in this small and cosy neighbourhood restaurant in Amsterdam. The service was great, prices reasonable and there was even a live singer to serenade you as you ate. An oasis away from the mayhem of Central Amsterdam.
Went with a group of pals they had amazing rare rib-eyes, some even stating best steak ever. I had the snitzel which was also fabulous. Friendly staff.
Cooked to perfection. You get what you pay for and it's worth the extra euro for a delicious meal. Service was great. It's quite small so maybe go early or prebook. The fillet steak is amazing
The steaks are wonderful at Luna. Also other Argentinian food seems authentic. Just remember to book a table as it is crowdy there.
A wonderful place with warm people and tasty South American food and an awesome meat too, has not missed ;)
Awesome steaks and the rest of the menu is just as good. The empanadas are spectacular as well as the sausages. Drinks are great as well. Well worth the visit.
Awesome food and great service The staff were really very nice and very responsive. The steak was simply awesome !
Good service. Had sausage and squids as appetizer, both very good. The Argentinean beef had great taste. Good value for the quality.
We enjoyed a wonderful dinner. No shortage of meat or atmosphere. Definitely worth a visit. We will come back
Managed to get a table on valentines night. Husband was very pleased to see a rose and chocolates were provided. The steak and service was amazing along with the house red !
Had a really great steak and amazing wine along with really good service. This place was recommended by Daniel international hairstylist!
We were greeted and made to feel welcome even though we hadn't booked. The food was outstanding & the staff were friendly & helpful. We'll definitely go back.
This restaurant was recommended to us by a local and it was wonderful food and service. Enjoyed it very much.
Look no further, probably the best south American meat you will find in centre of Amsterdam. Great prices and service too !

Absolutely fantastic evening had at restaurant Luna, they accommodated our large group as much as they could and surprised us with a Birthday desert platter. We couldn't have asked for more. The food was gorgeous.
Fantastic steak, great staff and nice atmo. Low key and small facility with relaxed tempo. Great place for a nice and solid dinner.
Cozy restaurant with excellent food. Affordable prices for what you get. Very hospitable staff. The restaurant is offering daily special menus.

column3: Great dishes, good portions and good price.
column4: We where looking for a good restaurant to have lunch but in Amsterdam most of the restaurants open after 5 or 6. We got there and everything was booked but they did an exception for us, everything was great! Thanks!
Fantastic steaks and nice and helpful staff. I would love a better sauce to go with the steaks. But: We had a great evening here!

We went on New Years eve as a party of 7 and all of us thoroughly enjoyed it! The place is lovely and quaint and has a lovely homely feel to it. Friendly staff and great food. The steaks were incredible!
One of the better steaks I had in my life!the meat is just fantastic, very good and highly recommended!!
Nice place to be with your loved one. Good food, moderate prices. Recommend it for small groups (2/4).

Kitchen staff is from Argentina, that's reasurring. Beef selection not the largest one, strange for an Argentinean steakhouse not to have costilla of cow. No dry aging neither. Rib eye was solid medium rare, chimichuri home made. All good and basic.

column3: Nice Argentinian restaurant with real good meat
column4: One of the places you have to try for Argentinian cuisine that means meat & stakes. As the portions are good, give a try to their imported wines.
Fantastic atmosphere. Steak was wonderful. Best meal of our stay. Went for my husbands 50th birthday dinner and they bought out apple pie with candles and sparklers. Lovely touch.
Lovely Argentina steak and the Roquefort cheese sauce is to die for. The bread for free was amazing. Lovely garlic butter and a meat/potato dip was so awesome. All for ‚Ç¨60 including drinks.
We would definitely recommend this restaurant for good food , warm and welcoming service and would return again if ever in Amsterdam. Thank you Restaurant Luna.

column3: Small and cosy with great food
column4: I like the simple and straightforward type of restaurant. No mess with the art. Just a simple cuisine. And Luna knows how to do it. Juicy Argentinian steaks beat all the competition nearby!
Had a wonderful steak here - last minute lunch, purely on advice of TP comments. And it paid off. Great Streak and Great Service.
Good wines and great vibe, the steaks were nothing to write home about. Decent wine selection but there are better steak houses in Amsterdam.
Best steaks ever, it was gorgeous food and a really relaxed atmosphere. The prawns were excellent too! Well worth a visit.
Had a lovely meal. We had the Argentinian steak and it was fantastic. The service was great and the ambience was great
We walked miles it felt to find this little cute place, but worth every step, the steak was amazing.
Excellent food and great service, really relaxed atmosphere and with 8 of us the staff were attentive and food & wine was excellent and prompt.

I visited this restaurant with a few colleagues after a long working day. Location is superb, in central Amsterdam. The selection of meat is outstanding and the dishes met our expectations. We had a great time and will come back

column3: Best steak I've had in a long time
column4: Amazing steak sandwich. We are here for lunch. Huge portions and great staff, friendly and lively. Would definitely recommend for a local or a visitor.
Sat on the street side seats. Portions massive, popular with tourists, but only one or two staff so beware when busy it can be a bit of a wait for service.
Really nice atmosphere and amazing meat from South America . Highly recommend with friendly staff and great music.

Riding bikes we stopped here. I'm glad we did! I had the Uruguayan cut of steak. Perfectly cooked. Great salad and wine also. Service was great and with a smile. A lucky find indeed. I would highly recommend this place.

Perfect meat, great sides and amazing wines to accompany the dishes. Great, authentic service. Will definitely be back. The restaurant is quite simple yet the food speaks for itself. Staff if really doing their best and it shows!

column3: Friendly, eat steak until it comes out of your eyes
column4: Very friendly staff, speak Spanish. Good meat, lots of options. Come early or have a reservation. Was luck that came very early for dinner at 17:00. This is definitively for meat lovers.
Amazing, amazing, amazing! Fantastic atmosphere, beautiful steaks, great staff, super prices! We had rib eyes with Roquefort sauce, best we have ever had! We will be back! Best to book!

Fantastic steak restaurant in the quieter part of Amsterdam. Loved the South American feel with live guitar music and really intimate atmosphere. Unsurprisingly it was full on Saturday night so I would recommend booking ahead - definitely worth a visit for any meat lovers!

Awesome staff and great food... There is a live band most nights and the terrace is great on a summers evening...the house wine was great... I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for value and a great dining experience...
As an Argentinian I can really recommend this place if you are craving for a good piece of meat, especially The parrilada, service is excellent.
The mixed steak selection always hits the spot. Add great staff and an excellent atmosphere and you have a restaurant we always make a point of visiting.

column3: Meat tops, rest of meal so-so
column4: The meat in an agentinian restaurant should be top ans is. The rest as potatoe and sause for the meat is soso. Service is okay, location (terrace is nice) interior is a bit crowded. All in all too expensive for the meal offered....
Very good food! Our steaks were perfect! Well priced and unique little restaurant. Staff very attentive. Nothing better than a nice steak and a pint!
Very nice waitress, lovely service, fabulous food. We called late for a table and got in no problem, we had the table at the window, loved it.

column3: Better than the average argentinian steakhouses
column4: Small and crowded restaurant in Jordaan, serving good empanadas and argentenian meat. Better to request the parillada/meat "rare" if you want medium rare.. they tend to overcook. The milanesas are huge portions for sharing. Wine was a disappointment. Service was friendly and efficient.

column3: Great food in the middle of the action
column4: I took a tenderloin and it was juicy and cooked exactly how I like it - red from the inside without any blood. I recommend this place to steak lovers. This recommendation cannot be complete without complementing the excellent service.
Food was fresh, well seasoned, and prepared well. Service outstanding and interested in making your visit a memorable experience. Highly recommend for meat lovers.

column3: If you love meat is the place to be!
column4: Not much to say, just go and enjoy, a great little friendly restaurant. Meat is superb. Delicious flan with cream and dulce de leche. In the Jordaan neighbourhood.
highly recommend this wonderful restaurant a quirky setting for fabulous food. nothing was too much bother would defiantly return thank you for your warm welcome
If you love a good steak you can't go wrong here.Had the meat empanadas and the steak selection couldn't fault it good deserts and nice staff
If want to enjoy the Brazilian /Argentinian kitchen, then this is the place to be! Very nice meat and fish dishes. Nice service

column3: Good restaurant in a quiet area of Amsterdam
column4: Steaks are very good here, decent choice and well cooked. The restaurant itself is quite compact and there isn't much room between the tables. Service is very good and they have music at the weekends.

Found this little neighborhood gem in the Jordaan district. From the avocado and hearts of palm salad to the Argentinian steak, a great experience. The service was very good and the house malbecwas a great addition.
We enjoyed a sharing platter of steaks from four different countries and nice house red wine here. This is a small place, so definitely worth booking in advance.

Great steak, cooked to perfection and fell apart in your mouth. Amazing. Great stuffed pepper to start. Generous portion! Loved the complimentary appetisers and great wine to add to your meal. Service great.
Loved, loved, loved the food. And the service was awesome. We will be back in Amsterdam again in 2 years and will be sure to eat here again.
Everything was perfect! The steaks are very good, the service is very nice and the location is also a plus...close to the central station, but on a quiet street.
The parillada was very good! Steak was tender, flavorful and the portion was more than we could finish. Authentic !

column3: It's loosing quality but still a nice place to dine.
column4: This Argentinian restaurant is the only one that I would go for a simple dinner at this kind of place in Amsterdam. But don't get very high expectations. They have nice products and the service is nice. Enjoy!
Fantastic steak, cooked to perfection and very tasty, However we both found the starters and sweet to be average at best. The service was good, very polite and friendly staff.

Started with excellent empanadas followed by terrific steaks, properly cooked. Very friendly and attentive staff. Prices very reasonable. Could do with more wines by the glass but the red offered was fine. No hesitation in recommending this.

column3: Probably the best steak in Ams
column4: Everything was so good. The steaks were almost perfect. You feel like you are in Argentina. The prices are reasonable, the wines are good. Just go there.üëçüëçüëçüëç
We ate dinner at Luna's restaurant. Our steaks were amazing and the side dishes were very delicious. The staff was very friendly too.
Wonderful atmosphere, bringing the spirit of South America! Specific, beaf basef menu for real fans of delicious stakes! Strongly recommend!

Went there with a very large group. Seriously good and large portion. I took well done meat and usually well done could be so dry - not over here, seriously good! Relax atmosphere. Recommended! The area is really nice to walk around as well.
Cozy place with great authentic South American grilled meat and good service. You get a nice plate of Uruguayan tapas while you wait, and the steaks do not disappoint.

My wife and I went on Saturday late lunch, not very busy but excellent ambiance, great service and "authentic" South American music. The steak was superb (Argentinian tenderloin 200gm medium rare) cooked to perfection served with great accompaniments and delicious malbec. Will definitely return.
Came here for our engagement dinner after proposing to my girlfriend, they couldn't have made it more special for us, gave us a lovely corner table and the food was amazing!
Lovely atmosphere in the hart of Amsterdam canals. The food is great and not too pricy, the house wines ask to be refilled regularly...
Went along to a cosy restaurant with warm service. Food was delicious - entrecote steak and chips. Would thoroughly recommend!!
Authentic food. Excellent appetizer and empanadas.Good wine selectio. Steak was little tough but overall a very reasonably priced and tasty meal.
Amazing food, steaks all round and melted in your mouth. Atmosphere was Latin fused and great fun. Staff friendly and fun. Definitely worth a visit. Oh and the apple pie is amazing .

Had steak all round......3 fillet and 1 rib eye....all cooked to perfection.....apple pie is to die for......we all shared it.....fantastic atmosphere and service......would definitely come back......reasonably pricedüòÉüòÉ

Visited Luna as it was close to our apartment. It has a lovely atmosphere, authentic and delicious food and live music to provide the perfect backing to the evening. Couldn't recommend this restaurant more. Perfect evening.

I've been to Luna all 3 times that I've been to Amsterdam, I love the cosy feel of the restaurant as it is tiny but thats it's charm. The staff are all very nice and work really hard. The steak is to die for!!

column3: Good food in funky fun atmosphere
column4: This is a good find. Away from more touristy spots is this funky space serving good Argentinean food. Beef and Tuna Empanadas are great. And the ribeye steak was fantastic.

Argentine beef was excellent one of the best I have had so far. Take at least the 200g portion you won't regret it. Staff was super friendly too. Live music was good, not too loud and added to the atmosphere. Would definitely return there.
Fantastic food, excellent service, reasonable prices. Excellent location away from the main areas but still captures a great atmosphere. Nothing more to say than that.

I was celebrating my Birthday and want to eat good Argetinean food. Well, the food was great (provoleta was amazing, empanadas were good, and milanesa de logo was excellent). The ambiance is ok. The bread service with the chimichurri butter is superb. Nice!
Came to this restaurant on our last night in Amsterdam. The steak was amazing. The place was really busy but they managed to find us a table.
Everything was fantastic: the delicious meat, the friendly staff, the charming ambient. We'll come back the next time we'll visit Amsterdam.
Lovely place near where we stay, our family had such a lovely dinner that we went back for dinner again the next day! The Argentinian steak had such great flavour, will definitely miss it
Visited Restaurant Luna with a group of 7 others and we all came away happy. The steak is excellent, as is the service. I would recommend!
It was very very good restaurang for the dinner, so thanks for the Trip Advisor's comments which I read beforehand. The atmosphere was friendly with live music and food extremely delicious üòÉüòÉ
We absolutely loved the food here. The steaks were cooked to perfection and of a really superior quality. When we return to Amsterdam, we will not hesitate to go back!
Lovely meal with amazing steak best meal in Amsterdam so far. Would recommend booking as it gets busy. Nice cosy place to eat. Would recommend it to anyone who likes steak.
Little, but really nice place! Argentine beef delicious, moreover people very kind! I've found it on TripAdvisor and I would recommend it!
Went to the Luna on Friday night with a bunch of the lads. The host made us all very welcome good steaks all round I would recommend the Luna !
We came as the first 2 people this saturday 11/4. The kitchen staff and waiter where so happy when we arrived. We get nice classic steakhouse style food! Well done to the all of their staff :)
We found this place thanks to trip advisor. Walking troughout the canals and reaching this place, with a lovely atmosphere, great food! I strongly recommend it!!
We wanted steak and had a look at what was in the area and had a good rating. We were not disappointed. Service was great, food was the best we have had in years. We definitely recommend Lunas.

We had a reservation for 7:30 p.m. We were ten minutes late. The owner gave us free drinks and appetizers even though it was our fault for arriving late. The food was excellent and the service was first class. Wonderful atmosphere. Don't miss this place.
If I could give 6 stars I would this food is amazing the most unassuming restaurant from the outside but this place is awesome the best meal I have eaten in a long time üëçüëç

Me and the better half busted here on a recent trip to Amsterdam. We found it easy enough after reading reviews on TA, and thought it was worth every Euro! Top steaks, good service and a nice atmosphere. Well worth a visit!!

The best steak that we have ever eat! Juice, tasty, and excepcional sauces. All cooked in the moment and very nice staff. Not too expensive for the quality of the food (less then 50‚Ç¨ for 2ppx). Recommended for a romantic luch/dinner.
You have got to try the melt in the mouth rump steak and I also recommend to treat yourself and get the 300 gram option. Great service and nice wine also.
Nice food , nice waitress, nice boss , what else :) You have to book a table , the restaurant is small!
The Luna Restaurant has great Argentinian steaks to offer, at really great and fair prices. Good atmosphere, great food and friendly stuff! What do you want more?
Great food, service! Strongly recommended The owner offered also a variety of Argentinian dessert after we had great Argentinian cuts ...

We went here for valentines meal. The food was amazing and the staff and atmosphere was really good. We had such a great meal we returned two days later after finding other restaurants where not a scratch on luna steak.

column3: Excellent meat, service, wine and entertainment!
column4: Absolutely wonderful! Steaks were cooked as requested and top notch. Beautiful bottle of Malbec for under ‚Ç¨20 and all accompanied by a very talented guitar player! Mustn't forget the staff who were friendly & attentive. Must go again......

We had just a perfect dinner! Warm and welcoming staff serving probably the best meat in town! At our night there the athmosphere was also spiced with live passionate guitar and singing from Argentina. Highly recommendable! Actually, don't miss this place!

We walked here from central station and it was certainly worth it. We had the sharing steak platter which was cooked to perfection but to be fair I could not taste the difference between any of them. Service was excellent.
Good service, delicious food, live music. A tiny place with live music and good energy! Highly recommend !

Beautifully cooked meat and generous portions. The waiting staff were so lovely and there was a guitarist playing Latino music was lovely and added to the already lovely atmosphere. They book tables but they are very popular, so be on time if you book.

Went looking for somewhere for a bite to eat on my own this evening and came across Luna. Only two people inside but the food was very good and reasonably priced. Would certainly come back again. Great steaks.
Delicious, I recommend trying the Argentinian steak. Went to Amsterdam with 3 friends for a brief visit. Decided to try it since it was close to where we stayed.
I have been coming here for years. Expect the best meat available in Amsterdam for very reasonable prices! Live music adds to the south american vibe. I will return soon!

not much to say about this little argentine restaurant...really delicious beef done to the point, huge portions...loved the avocado salad too...and invest an extra euro in a cold quilmes beer...it's worth it...super friendly staff and cat too

The atmosphere of Luna was perfect; great music and unique decor make it a great place to stop in. The food was also really delicious, and they were able to offer us a few good bottles of wine to match.

column3: one of best steaks and atmosphere's ever
column4: 10/10 Me and my partner were looking for a steakhouse a little off the beaten track and we stumbled upon this- the food, the wine and the nice romantic setting was everything we could of hoped for!!
Great Meal. The atmosphere was informal but professional, excellent food, not rushed but nothing was slow. Would certainly re-visit.
we enjoyed the food, the service, the smells, and beautiful ambients + good south american wines, and all of this two nights in a row :)
great quality produce, good ambiance, great wine. a must visit for a true lover of real Argentinian Beef
We had a nice time at Luna. Great food, interesting place with a authentic atmosphere and live music. Surely recommend this place.

column3: Genuine food from the River Plate (South America), the Argentinian restaurant with the best atmosphere in town.
column4: I went there during a business trip. The atmosphere is excellent. The food is particularly good and close to the real stuff (I visited Argentina and Uruguay several times and I love real Argentinean food).
My lamb chops and soup were great! Just that the restaurant was too tiny, so it will be crowded when the restaurant is fully booked.

column3: A nice pub of the beaten track
column4: Sat down for a couple of hours at this great pub in Jordaan. Had a snack and the food was excellent. Had some drinks and just loved the atmosphere at this small local pub...

column3: A great find in the Jordaan
column4: Lovely restaurant. Steaks are really good, starters excellent and the lamb chops just perfect. Guitarist playing - Saturday night - and very good value. Would highly recommend it.

Found this spot by chance on a busy Saturday night . Restaurant was full but the staff found a small table for us. The food was excellent ( steak and salmon). Our waiter was great, explained the menu and recommended a good bottle of wine....More

column3: What a lovely little restaurant, a really great find!
column4: We mooched round the market that sits opposite the restaurant & we were lucky enough to find a table outside this little gem of a restaurant. We sat & had a lazy Saturday lunch over a bottle of wine & whilst we only had the steak & chicken open sandwiches, would totally recommend this place as all the food that we saw looked delicious. Not sure I'd recommend for an evening meal but definately can't recommend enough for a chilled lunch meal!

It is a bit remote, but WELL worth the walk. The service, although a bit slow, was very friendly, with a relaxed, informal, charming style. And the steaks. OH, THE STEAKS! I don't think I've ever had meat that tender, juicy, full of flavor before. I kept cutting the bites smaller and smaller, wanting it never to end ... And, for once, when I asked for medium rear, that's how they cooked it. The chips were great as well. I strongly recommend this place!

There are many restaurants in this street and it was hard to choose but we picked this one just because of the look of the food people were eating and the look of the place. We werent disappointed. We had the corn, stuffed peppers, garlic prawns, beef, ceaser salad and palm salad. The bread and dips before the meal were superb and the food was really good and for four of us plus drinks it was under 100 euros which is not too bad. The only thing I wouldnt order again was the garlic prawn entree. The steak was superbly cooked and the chips were great too. Would definitely recommend this one...

Loved this place. The beef was outstanding as were our unique starters of squid and hearts of palm salad.  We were looking for a restaurant in our Jordaan neighborhood away from the glitz and this was perfect. Don't let the small number of reviews put you off - this place is excellent.

column3: The best two meals in Amsterdam
column4: We happened upon this tiny bar/restaurant when exploring the Jordaan area of Amsterdam. Lunch included delicious sandwiches and sides. The Argentinian beef is outstanding. It's very small, so make sure they can accommodate you. The food and service were so good we took the whole family there the next evening. Our vegetarian was even happy! Service was fast, efficient, and the food is excellent--hope you find it on your next visit!

column3: A great find in the Jordaan
column4: Lovely restaurant. Steaks are really good, starters excellent and the lamb chops just perfect. Guitarist playing - Saturday night - and very good value. Would highly recommend it.

Great steaks -good wine- life guitar music in weekends - spontanous tango songs when your lucky. Bargain menu when combined with Tango chanson concerts at the nearby Pianola museum.

Found this spot by chance on a busy Saturday night . Restaurant was full but the staff found a small table for us. The food was excellent ( steak and salmon). Our waiter was great, explained the menu and recommended a good bottle of wine. Overall, one of our best dining experiences in Amsterdam.

column3: The place to be for Surf and/or Turf
column4: The place to be for Surf and/or Turf lovers. Small selective card, very kind & helpful staff. Not touristy at all. Romantic and modern interior design.
One word: wow! Juicy amazing steak, like butter. Service that went above and beyond. Amazing! The salmon was beautiful, the wine wonderful. We loved it and will come again!
Ashley Pilot was an amazing server, very quick and friendly! Will definitely be back here if she will be serving us again.
Very good. Tried it for take away and was not bad at all. Excellent steak and accompanying veggies...

We came here for my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday meal and it was amazing. Juicy steaks - the best we‚Äôve had!!! Really yummy food and lovely staff. Not too expensive either. And unlimited chips! Would recommend.
Maybe the best meal I ate in Amsterdam. Food and wine are delicious and the amtosphere is great. Only thing I disliked was staff.

column3: This was a great find! The
column4: This was a great find! The steak was perfect. It was really busy so we had to wait to be served once we were seated. We booked in advance and they were turning people away.
Excellent food and service. Great steaks in a lovely restaurant with a great atmosphere. Definitely book ahead as it gets busy and booked up fast. Highly recommended!
beautiful food, steak cooked to perfection. good service and reasonably priced. Nice atmosphere, cold toilets
Great atmosphere . Delicious food ! Pricey but worth it . been twice - never disappoints! Nice area to walk round too

Great option in the center of Amsterdam, a few steps away from the crowded tourist areas. Local atmosphere. The menu has options for all tastes, good service and cozy ambience. Reservation recommended.

column3: To eat or not to eat!!
column4: People : great Service : great Atmosphere : relax Location : Just right Food : Delicious. Amsterdam is well known for the redlight district, BUT i must say: the food & restaurants are equally known Black&blue üëçüèΩü¶ûüî•üî•üî•
Absolutely incredible steak, with some fantastic wine and service to match! Bottomless chips was a bonus, although definitely didn't need it!
Relaxed atmosphere but professional and attentive service Food waste well prepared and cooked well only slight disappointment was portion sizes
We ate late about 10.00 pm it was a good steak but the chips were well over cooked or re heated chips!

I‚Äôve been here a couple of times and every time I‚Äôve had a wonderful meal with great service. I‚Äôd definitely give this a go if you‚Äôre looking for a good quality meal and you‚Äôre happy to pay a good price.
Me and my friend had a great dinner here. The service was excellent and the food was very tasty and cooked well. Would definitely eat here again and I would highly recommend.
Thank you so much Lisa for making hour time at the restaurant enjoyable, excellent customer service skills.
Good food, good wine and great service. Reasonably priced and fairly central. Steak Tartare is a must.

Excellent restaurant. Incredibly friendly and efficient staff. Good wine choice. I had the Lobster and my wife had the Cornish Hen. Both excellent. Bottomless chips also, which was nice! Decorated for Christmas, and a corner table gave an especially cosy feel.
Great burger! will definitely return when go back to amsterdam again. Server was super friendly and helpful. We had literally just arrived in the city!
Beautiful restaurant,cosy atmosphere. The steak was perfectly cooked, the unlimited fries and salad was a great service.Could of spent all night there.
beautifully cooked steaks, busy,vibrant atmosphere, interesting festive decor making creative use of different lighting and friendly and attentive staff. A lovely evening.

column3: Top service, top food, top ambience
column4: Steak were so good, that we took one more for desert. Ambience is very cosy and employees were really funny and nice.

column3: This can only be 5 star. Ambience,
column4: This can only be 5 star. Ambience, staff and food - all superb. An amazing ensemble of talent and cuisine. Congratulations!

Buy the 50 EUR Valpolicella, then the chefs flat iron steak - ask for the steak to be done medium. Hannah was excellent as were Okkr and Robin at the bar .(Martin made steak just right - even for an American)

This was a great restaurant, walked from the hotel. Best steak I had in a long time. great meal . Great service and drinks were good. My wife enjoyed her meal also. Must get reservations its a must. Nice atmospher.
Great steak and good service. Nice atmosphere and a cracking bottle of Malbec. Would definitely go again.

column3: Ate here twice in a row
column4: Perfect place for lunch. We had lunch here two days in a row, the food was so good we didn't venture anywhere else. Staff was nice, service very good.
Lively atmosphere and friendly staff. Great place to be for great steaks. We enjoyed it very much and we will be back again.

The steaks here are very good. The appetizers were also excellent. We started with burrata and oysters. My wife had a steak and they prepared it very rare as she likes it. They have a nice wine list as well. Our server Sjorns was excellent.

Service was ridiculous, waiters unable to have normal interactions with customers. Big misunderstanding about the price of the menu. Asking for splitting the bill looked like asking for stopping the launch of a shuttle. Not recommended.

We needed a place for lunch before the Anne Frank museum. They are nicely located, with decent seating. Lunch was really good. My wife got the steak sandwich and I got the angus burger. Service was good and food was excellent. Would definitely go back.
Excellent food and very friendly service with superb atmosphere and ambiance and very reasonable value for money
Very nice. 4 of us dined and had a lovely meal. The steak was good and el vino did flow. Starters and deserts all round, 4 steak dinners and a bottle of wine came to 230 euros.

Stumbled across this place as we were staying close by. We ordered the filet and it was cooked to perfection and served with the perfect sides. It was so good that we went back a second night. Totally recommend.

column3: It Was So Good We Went Again
column4: We had our first day lunch here and it was so good that we decided to go back for dinner. The staff was very friendly and attentive. The dinner was even better than our lunch experience.
Lovely romantic meal here with my husband. Food was delicious and if you are looking for great presentation then this is the place!
Our family had a great time. Steaks were cooked perfectly and the hen was too. Service was spot on and the endless fries. Definitely stop by for dinner and drinks.
Overall it was a nice experience but nothing extra ordinary. Service was good and location was very good and easily accessible.
We had a burger and steak both we equally delicious. We also ordered carpaccio wow, so good. Drinks we great, food, and service. We loved our visit and certainly would recommend.

Had a delicious meal here during our weekend in Amsterdam! I opted for the surf and turf (steak and lobster) and it was to die for. Friendly service and reasonable price. Would most definitely recommend!!
Perfect resraurant. Only for meat lovers If you want to eat fantastic food when you are in Amsterdam.. You have to go.....

The food was really nice and I would say it was cheap for the quality of the steak. It was very clean and the staff were attentive. The food came within a good time as well. Would definitely recommend
We ate lunch quite regularly here - burgers etc were very good and reasonably priced but not cheap - never needed to book, but dinner might be different.

column3: Good meat, but who serves Bavaria beer with it?
column4: Meat was very well prepared, but fries could be better. They should take Bavaria beer out of their menu, but luckily they had Cornet as well.

But neither excellent. Friendly service nice location good ambience but the food could be better. Unfortunately the variety of vegan choices is very limited, and what i tasted was just ok. I expected something more to be honest. Good effort but not enough.
We were at dinner one evening ... we ate very well, paid the right ... nice that you can have french fries and salad at will, as soon as those provided in the ordered dish are finished.
Very busy and crowdy restaurant and offering high quality food. Great steaks and very good wine ,all coming with unlimited fries and salad. Very good choice in Amsterdam!

why I always return to this place while there's hundreds of restaurants to choose from: a) fantastic team, b) fantastic atmosphere , c) fantastic food, d) fantastic location. a home away from home. i'll keep coming back for more.

column3: Better thank your average steak joint.
column4: Had a lovely birthday meal here, delicious bread to start and the steak is cooked to perfection. Can‚Äôt complain about the unlimited chips either. Puddings were tasty too! If you want to instagram your meal, Thai is the place for you.
We stumbled on this restaurant whilst walking in the nine streets area. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming and the food is excellent Young knowledgeable and enthusiastic staff
Stop by to get a quick bite. We had soup and the meatballs which were very tasty. They have a variety menu including serve steaks and salads.

This was a great restaurant with good service. We ordered the steak, the cod, and a salad. It was all very good. The restaurant was crowded so we ate at the small bar area. Make reservations if you can. We would definitely eat here again.
The food is amazing, the meat is super tender. Best we've ever had. The prices are pretty reasonable not expensive. On top of that the staff are so friendly they bring you joy 10/10
Recommended by a friend this restaurant did not disappoint, steaks, chicken, salads all excellent. Great service and really friendly Highly Recommended

we choose this restaurant because it was so close to our hotel. It was pretty full, noisy and the service not always careful. Food (meat as well as fish) was good cooked and the wine was ok. All together a nice evening
Incredible steak!! We had a slight cliche with the service but the Manager popped over, dealt with the small matter beautifully and all was great again. Food and atmosphere- awesome!

Got a blue steak w. Bernaise sauce. Not saying it is the best steak I have had, but up there with the top five and I've had some pretty nice steaks. Great atmosphere, brilliant staff, and worth the hour wait to get a table.
Ordered the pork now want to visit Amsterdam again asap to taste it again. Good wine for an honest price and very good service.
We went there on May with Tripadvisor's idea and it was a very good recommendation! The Black Angus is really good and the hamburguers are also great! Chips and salad are unlimited, fantastic!
Super tasty Angus burger, one of the best so far! French fries and salad are served as side dishes and they can be ordered as many times as you wish. Good atmosphere and service as well!
The steaks and desserts were delicious. Chips good too! Service was very pleasant but a little bit random. Atmospheric decor.
Had a group of 7 for a 21st birthday meal here - was fantastic, highly recommend the steak & Lobster. Staff were very helpful, location was easy to find and the atmosphere was good.

Had a lovely meal here on a busy night. Restaurant was full but service very good. Steaks were delicious (though a little more rare than I like - I ordered medium rare but it was very rare). Great food at a good price.
If you love good meat then go to this restaurant ! Also no too much tourist here, you will feel like living in amsterdam.
excellentservice tasty food good atmosphere. steak is recommended.lobster is juicy and fresh. wine is good and unreasonably priced top location

went here for an angus burger and beer. food was delicious and service very friendly and quick. you can have as much fries and salad as you want with no extra charge. nice location as well, away from the tourist hordes. will come again
I would highly recommend this restaurant. The flat-iron steak was perfectly cooked, the cabernet sauvignon was excellent and the unlimited chips and salad much appreciated.

Was on vacation and came across this restaurant. Went for my birthday dinner with my friend. The place was so cute and loved the decor and vibe! Besides that the food was sooo delicious!! Plus unlimited fries cant beat that(:
Went there with my wife on out first night in Amsterdam and it was fantastic. The service was friendly and the food amazing!!

column3: Go here before you visit the Anne Frank House
column4: This is a great place to dine at before or after you visit the Anne Frank House, as it is right around the corner. Everything we ordered was delicious...from the soup to the sandwiches and salads.
Sat at the bar, bartender was pleasant and helpful. Dinner was great and the gin & tonic delish!! Scallop and shrimp appetizers were very good. Steak was perfect!

Pure chance walking by the restaurant, we decided on steak fornthe evening meal. Fortunate to have a table available. Great soup, steaks were excellent and the Argentinean wine hit the spot. Lovely atmosphere, friendly staff enjoyable evening.
Great place around the corner from our place. Very good food and atmosphere. I would definitely recommend
Restaurant Black and Blue is a fine restaurant; great food and an excellent hamburger. The interior is quite modern, but still intimate. Love the place.

column3: Excellent food & service, warm cozy atmosphere
column4: Fantastic steak and food plus wonderful wait staff. Cozy warm atmosphere. Central location and easy to locate.

column3: One of the BEST meals we have ever had!
column4: 11 of us had the most amazing evening last night. The food was exceptional in a very beautiful restaurant. Thank you to all the staff for making my birthday unforgettableüëçüèª
Very good restaurant with friendly staff and great food. I highly recommend going to this place. I had roasted pork.
Great service, friendly and fast. Good atmosphere, food very good and loved the sweets at the end which came with the bill...lovely touch :) would return.

We arrived as a party of 5 with no reservation on a busy Friday night. The host was so nice and quickly tried to seat us and ensure we were happy with the table and or meal. Food is terrific. Lovely atmosphere. I will return.
We were able to get a reservation for 9 with very short notice. The food and drinks were great and it was a fun casual atmosphere.
The lobster starter was good, the fillet steak was cooked to perfection. Unlimited chips were also a bonus! Very warm and noisy in there though.
Our second time here, always busy so book in advance, food and service were amazing both times, Thanks again we will definitely be back x
