Terrific, fresh food. Highly recommended- a little different but everything was delicious. Especially the hamburger!
Friendly and helpful staff. Steaks were carefully prepared. Unlimited fries and salad. Great atmosphere. Make reservations.

Perfectly cooked steak exactly according to our orders. Crowded place even on a Sunday, so pre-booking is recommended. Straight forward, no surprises. Good service and nice atmosphere. If you like a steak this is the place. Nice starters as well.
A recommendation from a friend that proved to be amazing! Great food, fantastic service and all at a reasonable price. Impossible to fault anything...
This place was amazing. We had a phenomenal server, I unfortunately forgot her name, but we were there for brunch and the pickup service was great. Food and ambiance was amazing.

I liked the place and the atmosphere inside this nice restaurant in Jordaan district. I liked the burger pretty much while others didn't like the tenderloin because not too much tasty. Overall is good enough for a dinner

My girlfriends and I had diner there on Friday. Not only the service was great, the food and the wine were amazing! And not pricy at all for what we all got! Definitely coming back to this place soon!

Based on TripAdvisor reviews, we have decided for this restaurant to have our business dinner. The restaurant offered amazing food, very good service, pleasant and ambient atmosphere. Everyone was very satisfied and I can only recommend this place!
We sat at the bar and Linda waited on us. She makes a great drink. The tenderloin was excellent and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Reasonably priced.
Very good food and excellent meat with top notch service and very good atmosphere. One of my favorite in Amsterdam

Visited here in September 2018 and the food was incredible. We both had flat iron steaks which came with unlimited fries and salad and they were delicious. Cooked to perfection. Also excellent red wine very reasonably priced. Brilliant atmosphere, excellent food. Highly recommend.
No reservation made on an early friday night, but still friendy taken care of, an served a perfect steak. Both waitors gave a good impression, and food was really good. Do not hesitate to recommend.
Favorite dinner place in Amsterdam. Always bussy but tasty, get your table in advance. Plates not too large. Nice atmosphere.
We loved this restaurant! It is very stylish and modern and the food is too. Memorable Moscow Mule from the bartender.

Atmospheric and cosy restaurant with beautiful decor, friendly staff and delicious food. We had steaks, catch of the day and a salad with lobster - all delicious. The bill was ‚Ç¨130 for 4 of us with drinks so not too bad. Highly recommended!
Went here for a quick lunch. Very large, cosy restaurant with very friendly staff! Perfect place to replenish your energy when visiting Amsterdam!
Wonderful steak restaurant. Well priced, lovely warm atmosphere inside with fantastic staff. Also open during the days with cakes and coffees
We didn‚Äôt have a meal here but stopped to sit outside and have a coffee and macaroon. The view was nice sitting opposite the canal and the coffee and sweet treat was lovely too.
Thumbs up for this 'pure chance' find on the way to somewhere criss-crossing Amsterdam. The vegetarian curry was nice and so was the catch of the day.
Had dinner one night late. The concierge at our hotel recommended it. It was delicious. I only wish we could have eaten at Black and Blue again. I highly recommend it!

Our hotel recommended this restaurant as it is close to the Anne Frank House which we visited after dinner. The service was excellent. Waitress was very personable. We ordered steak for our meal which was delicious.
We booked and had a wonderful meal. Steak and Lobster cooked to perfection. Sam our waitress was fabulous and Alex kept the drinks coming.. Highly recommend
Lovely spot with views of the canals High quality steak and sea food Staff very helpful and one gent very entertaining earned a tip ;) Would highlighly recommend
Great staff make you feel like you belong here. Food is tasty- burgers with endless fries and affordable crayfish! Location is fabulous. Can't go wrong!
Enjoyable atmosphere, excellent service and a wonderful cheeseburger made for a fine evening. The menu was extensive and everyone seemed to be enjoying their meals..
Great quality steaks, endless chips and salad. Had the best meal here, of our holiday whilst celebrating our wedding anniversary :)

An excellent meal. Each member of the family had a steak grilled to their liking. They also have huge salads with your choice of steak, chicken or veg. Great customer service. Very popular and gets crowded so reservation suggested. Easy to do on line.
Excellent service, especially Stela does a great job of making the guests feel at home, very warm and personal . And the rib-eye is great. Definitely go by and enjoy some good food and drinks
We thoroughly enjoyed our meal here. The service was first rate and the food excellent. Would definitely return here again.
Sea bream lightly smoked then briefly pan fried and baked. Asparagus on the side. Great draft beer and very helpful staff.
Excellent service highly recommended Food was delicious and different in presentation Very happyily surprised with the attention to detail

column3: Mediocre food and hell of a wait
column4: Came in with a buddy of mine to have a steak. Wait took about an hour to get the main course and service was poor. Food was quite average. Wouldn't recommend.

Simply one of the best steaks I have ever had. Served with fries and salad - refillable on request. Accompanied by a bottle of Merlot. Totally recommend this place. We booked online and well worth doing as by 8pm it was pretty busy.
By far the best dinner we had out of three nights in Amsterdam. Everything was excellent from the great waitress to the dessert.

Went for dinner with friends to this great restaurant. We can recommend the 600 gram two person steak. Service is lovely. Special thanks for the lovely waitress Sam, she really goes the extra mile for you. Thanks! The students
Wandered in here during King‚Äôs Day. Loved this little place. Outstanding burger. Nice choice of beers as well. Great location.
Loved the relaxed atmosphere , fabulous steaks and great service . Best meal of our stay and would definitely go back .Cant praise it enough
Our dinner here was rather uninspired. Nothing memorable. The steak was OK, the curry bowl was boring. Service was OK. We were disappointed on our first night in Amsterdam.
Fab restaurant, top steak, great atmosphere and fabulous, friendly staff and unlimited fries :)! Pay it a visit!
Great atmosphere...great service.. great food...I had steak and half lobster......both excellent.... also liked fries and a great vodka drink with lemon sorbet and prosecco.....
We turned up here quite late in the evening and it was pretty full but they found us a table - burgers great - i had a salad which was very nice - the Malbec was good.
Such an amazing restaurant. Beautiful food and great service. 100% recommend. Me and my girlfriend stayed nearby here and was by far our most favourite meal.

Well located on Leliegracht, Black and Blue offers an intimate and nicely decorated location. Excellent meat, super friendly and nice service, it is definitely a place to enjoy and go back. All worth it
Dinner with friends at Black and Blue - quick and attentive service, the waitresses were friendly. The food suggestions were spot on, delicious juicy steak for main. Desserts are worth checking out

column3: Best steak I've had in a long time
column4: Loved this restaurant..... atmosphere food and service all top class. Recommended by friends prior to the visit but will definitely be returning to try some more items on the menu
Very good service, food and drinks, decoration, ambiance. Went for brunch/lunch. Good price for value.
I had a great dinner here on my recent unplanned trip to Amsterdam! The wait staff was super friendly and the food was delicious.
The service was good, the prices were normal, the employees were gregarious, they were helpful when we chose meals. I will visit Black&Blue when I go to Amsterdam again.
Service , food and ambiance superb. My wife and I had a lovely valentine nights dinner finished off with a real long stem red rose foe my wife. Worth a visit if you have a couple nights in Amsterdam.
Both had steak, which was cooked just as we asked. We came early evening so restaurant wasn't busy, service was good as with most of Amsterdam, good quality food for prices.
Great little restaurant with frienfly staff and lovely food without being over the top on price and unlimited but gorgeous chips & salad. Well worth a visit when your in Amsterdam.
very busy evening, nevertheless the service was professional and all dishes arrived in time and were of very good quality. We all had various steaks - all perfectly grilled.

Myself and two others Dined here and not one of us had a negative thing to say absolutely beautiful food in a fantastic atmosphere one of my favorite dining experiences in Amsterdam highly recommended
Went there with my parents and my boyfriend. The service was great and the food and the wine too. Would love to go there again.
Highly recommend, lovely people, very busy so I‚Äôd advise to pre-book (call them super easy) food was amazing!! Wine list great! Would definitely return...

column3: Great dinner from start to finish!
column4: Any steak lovers visiting Amsterdam should definitely add this restaurant to their list of things to do. Great food from start to finish. Not overly priced either.
Highly recommend this place, Steak cooked to perfection with unlimited fries and side salad,really friendly and helpful staff If I‚Äôm ever back in Amsterdam this will be my first stop!
This a beautiful restaurant with canal view. Friendly staff and great ambience. Surf and turf was great, and the grilled scallops, and the shrimp in garlic.
Visited for friends 40th... awesome steak and salads. Wine menu good and service. Even jokey when they forgot the drinks... no rush.

I had drinks and dinner (hamburger) and got great food and great service. Sometimes when places get popular and tourists discover it, quality goes down. My experience here was the contrary. Personal attention, good food and a happy atmosphere ... would definitely go there again.

We are staying in this amazing place right now andand I can‚Äôt help sharing our emotions! Food, atmosphere, service is absolutely deserve 5 stars. For cosy time and nice atmosphere with quality dining is one of the best places to be.

column3: Really enjoyed the food and restaurant
column4: I visited with my partner and his teenage daughters and it appeased all of us. Great service, very good food and great atmosphere. Absolutely essential to book in advance for peak times though.
Visited whilst walking past. So glad we did. Very nice place. Great atmosphere and friendly staff... A must visit.
Well, best stek so far I‚Äôve had in my life! Nice quiet restaurant with lovely waitress, good quality wine and beer! What else do you want!!
The service was friendly and the food (steak, gambas) were very nice. Good quality for the price. Definitely a recommendation.

Stopped in for lunch on the passing and were not left disappointed. Hot chocolate and latte were delicious, accompanying macaroons the same. Sandwiches were magnificent and filling. Friendly and helpful staff
we eat the 600G Ribeye,very Good!!. the service is very slow. the restaurant was full. recomendation is high.
Staff was very attentive and patient even if our group was so large and diverse. The meals came on time and the staff was always attentive.

The food was excellent. The grilled lobster was to die for!!! The service was good but a little bit over the top. Excellent wibe in the restaurant, very relaxing and made us relaxed. We can truly recommend this restaurant. We will come back.

The atmosphere is wonderful and super swanky. The staff are uber helpfully and friendly, really make you feel at home. The food is beyond amazing, the beef is to DIE for!!! 100000% recommend to ANYONE coming to Amsterdam

We found this recommendation on TripAdvisor and thought we'd give it a go- so glad we did. Great food, service and atmosphere, enough 'posh' to make it feel special but not so much it felt uncomfortable. Great prices and wonderful steak- definitely worth a visit!
Couldn‚Äôt fault it! Food was amazing! And the service was fantastic! Death by chocolate is a must have!

We loved our dinner at Black and Blue. Delicious food, lovely and cozy atmosphere. Sophisticated, diverse crowd. Excellent service. In the Jordaan neighborhood of Amsterdam. Their sister restaurant, also near by, called BLEU is also wonderful!
Our hotel recommend this restaurant, as a lot of eating establishments are closed on a Sunday. Booking a must as when we arrived it was full. Service very good as was the food. Would visit again.
We stopped in here just before we flew home. Plenty of seats on a Mon afternoon. Good flat iron steak, garlicky prawns and fries. Great view onto a canal. Good place.
Perfect meal at the end of a day. Great service reasonably priced. Great scallops and steak unending fries

column3: Well worth a visit - quality menu
column4: Saw this restaurant in Amsterdam with good TripAdvisor reviews, so gave it a go. Wasn't disappointed. Good quality food in a pleasant atmosphere. Relatively limited menu but covers most key requirements. Traditional steakhouse fare done well. Liked it so much went back again.
Delicious Food with elegant presentation of the appetizers and salads. I would definitely visit it again.

This is a very comfortable, somewhat upscale restaurant. Food was excellent but service was a bit slow at times. Staff was friendly and welcoming. Restaurant was comfortable and provided a relaxing setting for a nice lunch. Prices were fair and food was very good.

I have previously been to the restaurant but my brother hadn't. We weren't disappointed. The staff were really friendly and efficient. The food and the drink were great quality and overall good value for money. Would recommend this to friends and family alike
We went for my birthday , starters were lovely but portion is small. The steaks were amazing , cooked to perfection . The desert was delicious and different. Service was exceptional. would come back.

Nice venue in a great section of the city. Good vibe and ambiance. Filet and lobster was excellent as was shrimp, pesto and garlic appetizer. Ham bruschetta not so much. Service fine not great. Decent value. Would come back.
Had a fantastic meal, lovely staff and brilliant atmosphere. Couldn't say much more. Highly recommended
Our meal at this restaurant was excellent. Be sure to make a reservation as they appear to be very popular judging by the crowd.
We just read a previous review whilst sitting here drinking a nice Tempranillo overlooking the canal. Totally recommend this small, friendly place. Put it on your bucket list.
We had lunch here and found the food to be very good. The service was very fast, and the waitresses were friendly. Excellent coffee also. Highly recommended!
Visited on a Sunday night, service was great lovely feel to the place lively atmosphere, food was pretty good if slightly over priced. If in the Dam would certainly return !

Went here for our last meal as a small group last Sunday around 3pm before returning to Australia. Ordered the 600gram steak with lobster topper. Absolutely amazing :) Service wasn't what I thought it would be. A little slow. Still amazing steak though

column3: Great steak, rich salad, friendly staff!
column4: Very good skeaks, salad rich with flavours, tomato soup tasty, correct fries and staff helpful and smiling.

We went with my family and some friends we really enjoyed the restaurant. Food was awesome. Great hamburger, better salads and steaks are very good. Great service as well. We step into the place with out check a review. We just walk in.

Had dinner here. We both had steak which was absolutely excellent. We shared some of the snack starters which were also great (olives and Bruschetta). Lovely staff and was a busy place but well looked after.
We had dinner on a Sunday evening. Nice food, Friendly waitress. Steaks were prepared to perfection.
Delicious meal, for 22 Euro - 200 gm steak (fantastic quality), all you can eat chips and salad and bottled water.
Great service with really friendly staff, nothing too much trouble. The gambas prawns with avocado was delicious followed by a succulent steak. Really recommend.

I booked online about 3 weeks in advance as we wanted to visit on a Saturday evening. Great location , just around the corner from Anne Franks house. Smart casual dining with great staff, fantastic food and a happy vibe.
Just round the corner from Anne Frank house this small restaurant offers good fresh food and a good choice of drinks with tables inside and out.
Loved this restaurant the ambiance is so good. Had the ribeye steak. Great wine list. Service excellent.

column3: Delicious food but small serves and slow service
column4: The waiters were lovely though we waited a very long time to be served. The food was delicious though the serves were very small for what we paid!
Great restaurant! Very close to everything but with local feel. Service and food were wonderful and reasonably priced.

column3: Great steaks in a picturesque setting by the city canals.
column4: Great service, nice tasty food and quite selection of good wines and other drinks. Delicious desserts too!
Great atmosphere and food. Worth going, steak was great and located in a great area Jordaan so nice to walk along the canal after. Staff where very nice and food was great highly recommended
Fantastic friendly service and the best steak I have ever tasted. I would strongly recommend you visit! Also it serves late - after arriving on a late flight we ate at about midnight.
I visited with a party of 12 and found a real gem. The steaks were simply delicious with excellent service in a warm, friendly environment. I shall return.
Great little spot popular with locals and recommended by hotel. Buzzy atmosphere with excellent food. Close to Franke house. Must book. Would return. Staff excellent.

column3: Great place for a coffee near the Anne Frank house
column4: Dropped in for a mid-morning coffee before visiting the Anne Frank house. Great place, good service, pleasant ambience. Recommended.

column3: Lunch near the Anne Frank House
column4: Good lunch spot near the Anne Frank House. Service and food were great. It was quiet at lunch, but likely is busy at dinner.

Had an amazing late lunch in this restaurant. Poached egg and salmon was to die for. My friends ordered salads and steak sandwich and both presentation and quality of food was highly complemented. Located on quiet street, you can sit&eat and enjoy canal view.
This restaurant is located near the Anne Frank House not far from the Palace. We stopped in for a sandwich - and were pleasantly surprised with the decor, food and service.

column3: Great local stop for afternoon coffee and macaron
column4: We stopped in for a break to enjoy coffee and we were greeted by friendly staff. There was an assortment of fresh baked goodies to eat also.
Good atmosphere and service. The food was excellent and more than enough to stop the bottomless fries and salads after the first round. A very nice find.
Service with a smile, that was wonderful! All of the food we ordered was excellent and the decor was nice.
The food was good and the service was prompt and the staff nice. I would recommend this restaurant for a casual dinner or lunch
Me and a friend had a lovely lunch sat out the front in the sun, the food is absolutely delicious and very reasonably priced. We were very impressed!

column3: Great place, terrific food but busy
column4: Went with family. Had a terrific meal. Starters (Gambas) were excellent and steak perfectly cooked and full of flavour. Service was initially perfect but got a little slow when the place got totally full. Offset by bustling atmosphere. Highly recommended.
We came across this restaurant by chance while out looking for somewhere to dine, we quickly secured a table for 2 and had a delightful meal Would recommend
Great steak. Great service. Great decor. Great wine. Buzzing modern restaurant. A great find. Look no further.

Went here on a recommendation from a friend. Atmosphere was good. Service was excellent. Salad and fries were served to share. Steak was average, but salad was excellent. Wine by the glass was good and moderately priced by US standards.
Business meal at this mid-priced restaurant close to Ann Frank House. Enjoyed the meal, nice setting, good staff, decent wine... would definitely return

column3: Nice quaint restaurant with good food
column4: Good food and services ! A 5-10 min from main shopping stretch. Will love to be back! Spent estimated Euro30/pax.
The food was lovely, so tasty! We had the sharing steak and it was cooked perfectly for both of us. The staff were lovely and attentive and I would definitely go back again!

great flavours and friendly staff who gave us a splendid evening with good quality food fish and meat both are very good price / quality a lovly restarant at the lelie canal great we will come back.for the death chocolate WHoow..

column3: Nice cozy restaurant with great food
column4: Nice cozy restaurant with great food. We enjoyed the nice decor, helpful hosts and great food (try the hamburger...). Reasonable prices, nice merlot, good deserts (especially the roasted pineapple). Definitely worth a try.
Enjoyed an evening meal here. Very comfortable and close to our hotel. Good service and enjoyed a very nice meal.

We were tempted in by the advert for gluhwein and we're not disappointed. The food was well presented and extremely good. Service was great and it was a relaxing environment to pass away time and have a few glasses of gluhwein! Good value for money.
A lovely venue - really liked the decor. The food was excellent and a welcome respite from snowy Amsterdam! Would definitely recommend and go back if we get the opportunity.

Great find in Amsterdam. Fennel soup and soda bread were delicious. They also serve bread with a warm cheese dip. The staff were friendly and the jar of boiled sweets with the bill was a lovely touch.

Everything perfect! The ribeye steak 600gr was perfect! Alias, more then perfect!! The stuff are very friendly, the ambient is nice and much nicer than the people here posted the photos. I really recommend this restaurant.
Delicious steak in a cosy original restaurant. Very friendly personnel. Be sure to reserve a table beforehand though.

column3: Worth it only for the dessert
column4: I had the bruschetta and the lady steak and I was not at all impressed. The petit gateau however was good. Service was awful, waitresses were slow. Choose another place if you can
Stayed at a nearby hotel and decided to stop in for dinner. Atmosphere was nice. Prices were not expensive. Food was pretty good.
Relaxing atmosphere, great steak, lots of fries and some other interesting choices. The place to come for a good steak dinner.
The food was served by friendly staff and to a very high standard. It was clean and the food was presented well and delicious

We came here in the afternoon, since the placed seemed to be really charming. We ate something little and drunk an afternoon coffee. Everything was delicious and the staff was lovely. I would recommend it to everyone.

visited here for mid-afternoon drinks, however had we been staying in the City longer would definitely have returned for dinner. Really nice setting, friendly staff and the food looked fabulous. Best value place we visited too, and a good location.
This place was awesome! Great atmosphere, extremely friendly and attentive staff, best service in Amsterdam. Food was amazing as well, would come back here in a second.
A good value steak house with very friendly staff. We both ate the tenderloin and it was beautifully cooked.

We had the best meal last night. Steak was cooked to perfection and the relish complimented it perfectly. The service was very friendly and very helpful. We would recommend Black and Blue to any visitor or local to Amsterdam. Anne & Evert Melbourne.

Really enjoyed the service here, the steak was tasty but portion size very small and they undercooked it more than we asked but in return we didn't pay for drinks on the bill so customer service was great.

column3: One of the better places we ate at in Amsterdam
column4: This place is located a couple of streets down from Anne Frank's house. It was really good food with wonderful presentation. We got hamburgers and they were pretty good.
We visited on Xmas day and the food and service was excellent, the steaks were fantastic well worth a visit
We popped in here for some gluevein during our walk. Quick service, loved the d√©cor. I wanted to stay for some food, but we had to press on.

column3: Best steak I have ever eaten!
column4: What can I say, great atmosphere, friendly staff and the food was amazing. The waiter took me to the kitchen so I could thank the chef! "What a meal" We will be back! Thank you
Great Angus burgers and excellent service. Burgers come with chips and salad, just ask if you want more.
We ate here twice during our stay, both times amazing .. chicken and peanut sour dough for lunch and steak for dinner. Highly recommend reasonably price!

column3: Friendly, tasty restaurant we stumbled upon
column4: The staff were friendly, accommodating for us English folk. Great steak burger, bruschetta and wine. Perfect for couples and groups of friends.
I have had lunch here a number of times and it is perfect with a menu that suits any mood, Good service and in a quite cross street between two of the canals
We got in late evening and were going to get pizza recommended by our house host but they closed so nearby was Black and Blue. We were pleased with our dinner. Excellent steaks and service.
Was there with a few colleagues and we were all impressed. Cozy restaurant with great staff and amazing food, especially the steak. Highly recommended!
Nice atmosphere and the best meat. We chose steak with fries and it was a magnificent solution. One of the best steaks I've tasted. Service also very kind
Great place with a friendly atmosphere, deliciously cooked food and simply nice interior Steaks, burgers, soups and salads are all tasty)
Very good service, and extremely nice staff. Food is normal, we didn't try many things, but it was ok. The quality of the meat was also good.
Great restaurant, friendly staff and great food. We visited twice and both times were excellent, we had the Black and Blue Steak and all you can eat chips and salad. Highly recommended.
Busy but good atmosphere in this steak restaurant. Lovely meal, if you want a good steak and chips. Around the corner to the Toren hotel.

Came here with a group of friends after reading reviews on Trip Advisor. Would highly recommend, delicious steak and complimentary chips as well which was a nice bonus. Best to book though as it got very busy when we were there.
Restaurant had especially good stakes with fries and salad & nice atmosphere. The service was also good.

Had a superb meal celebrating a close friends birthday. All food was prepared as it should be and steak was exceptional. Service was excellent too - restaurant was pretty busy - would definitely go again. Staff were very friendly definitely recommend üòä
Dinner was wonderful, salad very fresh and steak outstanding. Our server who had been to our city was terrific and personable.
The Angos was delight. Hospitality was very good. The right place for the one who wants the best steak. Reservation needed in order not to be disapointed.
A restaurant with a great ambiance, excellent food and prices similar to the UK (a relief in Amsterdam). Really good ‚Äì would recommend.
Good restaurant, quite busy but cosy atmosphere and good food. I would recommend a table on de ground floor.

column3: Excellent steak restaurant in quiet area of town - great!
column4: Fantastic little restaurant that does gorgeous food. Great interiors and local atmosphere. What's not to like? We shared a chateaubriand steak - AMAZING. Ask for the table at the top of the stairs.
This restaurant was just a few doors away from our BnB and we had a lunch there. Very good tasty, fresh food and the most delicious macaroons served with the coffee! Service was great too.
This is a very classy place with outstanding food, drink, and atmosphere. Fully intend on visiting again.

Staff at hotel recommended this restaurant and it was definitely a top tip! I had steak - REALLY good and husband had burger which seemed to hit the spot then shared very nice lemon cheesecake with raspberry ice cream
Good food, nice place, great men√π. I suggest wine because there is just one kind of beer which is not the best in the world.
Top steaks served up here - well worth a visit if you are near by. Will be back if nearby in future.

column3: Very pleasant, tasty and friendly place
column4: The restaurant was five minutes away from our hotel. Great food! Especially the steaks. Good service. We thought our order includes meat. When the waiter found out that we were disappointed she brought us an extra portion of Fillet without charging.
very mediocre breakfast/brunch however we heard they cooked a good steak. After brunch though, we weren't willing to give it another crack....

Dined here twice for diner and once for lunch. Good food, particularly the bruschettaüëå. Service excellent with the most pleasant and friendly staff. Premises well appointed and ambience spot on. Great place to dine and watch the world go by.
A restaurant with great steaks and a very friendly ambience. AND proper double-fried chips with, of course, mayonnaise galore!!
The Bruschetta was to die for! The bread was so amazing i want to learn how to.. Also the meat was a dream. Perfectly cooked. Exquisite.

Great steak, and lovely starter. Decor is Lovely and all would have been fab but our waitress was totally disinterested and didn't bother if we needed more drinks when our food arrived. Shame as Could be great.

A really good location and a perfect rib eye. The steak was cooked over charcoal so a really good crust and additional flavour. The service was excellent. Only down side being it was a little pricey for what it was.

column3: Excellent food, friendly staff & wonderful atmosphere
column4: Visited with my husband on our first night in Amsterdam. Oysters to start (lovely) followed by steak frites with salad. Staff very friendly and attentive. All in all a wonderful experience - we will be back!
Food, atmosphere was great. As the place is crowded, the personnel is busy with lot's of work, and sometimes it takes some time until your request is filled.

column3: Waitresses, food and ambiance are awesome
column4: We bumped into this beautiful restaurant after we finished the Anne Frank museum. It's awesome and they served a very tasty onion and Fennel soup... wow

Spent a very nice evening here recently. The staff was very helpful and always available if we had any queries. The menu is good and I highly recommend a medium cooked black and blue steak with the chocolate cake for dessert.

Lovely aesthetic and atmosphere, they have a fabulous deal on a coffee and macaroon. My latte was beautifully made and the macaroons are truly delicious, however the staff were not particularly friendly although not altogether unpleasant.
Ate here on a Saturday lunch time. Food was nice comfy seats and nice and quiet away from the bustle of the city. Staff were friendly

column3: Great find during our one night stay in Amsterdam
column4: Great little restaurant that was near our hotel. Our family enjoyed the meal although the noise level was quite high. Service was only so-so as waitstaff got busy with several large tables. Food was great!

Just around the corner from our hotel and obviously very popular. The staff were great and the food matched. Particularly enjoyed chips which the staff replenished, gratis, when we finished the first serving.
If you're looking for a fantastic meal look no further, this place ticks all the boxes, oysters, Steak tartare, ribeye for two, 2 bottles of wine ‚Ç¨140 great value, not to be missed

We dined here for lunch after a morning walking tour. The food was simple, wholesome, & freshly prepared & the atmosphere is really hip. My boys loved their burgers, & I wouldn't hesitate to dine here again.

Great food, reasonable prices. The burgers were terrific. The seafood was grilled, including the mussels, which gave them a great flavor. Meals came with fries and salad, which they gladly refilled. A great find!

We passed by this place along the canals and decided to check it out. We are so glad we did. The food is great and the service staff are very pleasant! I loved the burgers especially and went back for it twice!
Business dinner for 6 - 2 courses on 20-June 2016. Steak pretty good all round but mine was overdone. Starters just a little better. 4* for service and venue, 3.5* for food.
Wonderful lunch in picturesque location. Service was fantastic, overlooking a lovely canal, I thoroughly enjoyed my steak and fries, with a delicious glass of red wine.

We went to the Anne frank museum and we're looking for someplace close Thru tripadvisor I found this restaurant. We had the beef tournedos, pork loin and the eggplant All were so amazing and the service was terrific

column3: Cappuccino time with a sweet surprise!
column4: We just visited the Black and Blue to have a break and a coffee in a relaxing atmosphere. I ordered a Cappucino and surprisingly it came with a "macaron". Excellent location, comfortable place and kind service. What else?
Very relaxed vibe. Right of the canal from the Anne frank house. Although the seating is very close to others in the restaurant, it has a very private vibe. Great food and even better service
Beautifully tender and delicious steaks. Served on wooden platters so food went cold quickly but otherwise faultless. Delicious desserts too.

column3: Good service with some unique food options
column4: We had good service from our server, offering some great options for dinner. We decided on the soup of the day, a roasted vegetable pur√©e which was very tasty. We also had the roasted eggplant and steak, both hit the spot.
I went to this restaurant one night as it was near my hotel in Amsterdam. The food was surprisingly good and the staff were friendly.
We enjoyed the restaurant! Every thing was delicious and service is great We had the angus steak and the hamburger. Next time in Amsterdam, we will come:)
We were a group of 9 people here for a birthday meal, great service, food and wine. Would definitely recommend this restaurant. High quality food for good value.
Great food, juicy, perfectly cooked steaks. You can have half lobster with the steaks! Very good service, friendly, attentive.
Had a lovely meal and great staff. I like the way the steaks were so tender and endless chips and salad. The house wines were nice so didn't need to go mad. I would go back again
We had one of the best steaks ever at this restaurant- great quality meat cooked to perfection. Attentive staff who were also able to advise on wine choice.

Turned up without a reservation and the staff couldn't do more to get us a table on a busy Saturday night. When seated staff couldn't be more friendly and helpful. Food was absolutely fantastic! Would recommend this to anyone!
Tired of walking around the 9 canals on your way to the cheese and tulip museums, we found this wonderful cozy restaurant, with delicious food! Totally worth and great rest!
Great wine, good service and lovely surroundings. Steak was perfectly cooked and as rare as we asked for (blue - which is rare!). Will definitely visit again.
Loved the steak here, which was cooked extremely well. The restaurant was slightly cramped but well presented and the service very friendly. Highly recommended!

We visited the restaurant during the National Restaurant Week. We had a 3 course meal The steak was amazing, the dessert was really really good as well. I ordered carpaccio as a started.. it was just ok. but the rest was really great.
It was amazing evening for my and my family. Food was really great and service was at the very good level. I DO recommend this restaurant. Enjoy!

We had a great experience at Black and Blue. Unsure of where to go to get a good meal, the friendly wait staff greeted us and made recommendations. The steak was amazing. Thank you for our awesome first meal in Amsterdam!

Very fluent place. Did not knew much about Dutch local beers and where bitter balls got the name. American style place. Service was good though. Bitter balls were good. I wonder, why call bitter? Not much bitter in taste. But... that is another subject.

We found ourselves unexpectedly in Amsterdam when our flight was cancelled. We were so hungary and they were totally full but they graciously fit us in at the bar Great steak and hamburgers and the most efficient staff ever

column3: Good place for steaks in a nice and warm atmosphere
column4: The Steak placet Black and Blue is the place for anyone who loves good, pure food and a relaxed atmosphere. The service was very friendly and volontarily spoke German which is always the case in Amsterdam. Meeat was very good and the wines too.
This is a really nicely decorated restaurant with very comfortable seats, nice food and good choices, staff were also nice!
We went here on restaurant week, so we had a small menu to choose from. It was SO tasty! Very nice place.
The food is over priced, the staff was rude and snobby and the whole thing was a huge disappointment. Go to literally any other place.
Beautiful little restaurant with good food and good service just two minutes walk from Anna Frank House.
Nice simple menu with very good food. The staff are great, the food is fresh and well cooked and plentiful. Well recommended
I picked this restaurant based upon review and I was very happy I did. One of the best steaks I have. Service was great. Definitely a must.

I had a dinner here with my family in march. It's a Good steakhouse, nice location and atmosphere and the Waiter was a nice smiling girl. Great steaks, the price was Good compared to what we ate. Reccommended

column3: One of the best steaks I've eaten
column4: Had the black and blue steak at medium rare, which was really tender. Service was abit slow though, and the Chocolate fondant was slightly disappointing since there were very favorable reviews.
The ambiance is great, next to the Anne Frank museum. The food was absolutely great. Good stake, tasty salads. Very recommendable and NOT expensive. Service was really good. A must in Amsterdam.
Cozy place with delicious food and nice beers. Close to the Anne Frank House and city center. Reserve at night, seems to be very busy and popular

column3: Cool place for lunch, and I expect dinner is good too
column4: Excellent steak in a very cool (in a hipster way) setting. Nice staff, good food, although I hate getting food served to me on a wooden board - didn't detract from the taste!!!
Perfect place to eat an excellent Angus meat. We asked for the Black Angus Tournedos. People very nice and good service. Try it, you will enjoy it!
Nice d√©cor, good service, really good steaks. Reserved through the TripAdvisor's app, very easy. Came with friends to celebrate a birthday.
Dined here with my partner in early March 2015. Food was superb. We both had steak which was cooked to perfection and the unlimited chips was a treat! This place is a must try if visiting Amsterdam!!
Impressive amount of seats but still cosy and the service works fine. The food was excellent and also the recommended "house wine".
Excellent food, service and price. great atmosphere and will defo visit again next time we're in Amsterdam. Had Angus steak with lobster and both were cooked to perfection,

The restaurant was very busy so advise to book otherwise you will not get a table until very late. The food was excellent, the Service was very friendly and accommodating. The steaks were superb and the French toast dessert - OMG!! Definitely recommend.
I have been in bed ever since being sick. This place should be shut down I asked for a well done burger and it was red raw! Bad

Enjoyed a quiet late lunch after a morning of sightseeing. I had the romain salad topped with goat cheese. The amount of cheese was so generous that I couldn't eat it all. (It was delicious though). Their burgers are also quite tasty as well.

Fab Place, lovely setting, Staff so helpful and couldnt do too much to help. The Food was lovely. Will be recommending it to the rest of my family when they visit Amsterdam at the beginning of February
We had Christmas dinner over there and was amazing he staff was so nice and the food lovely, highly recommended.
Best service of all time and the prices are so fair! Use the bathroom, it is fantastic. And I suggest you have a hot chocolate with their macaron, because it is delicious!!
The atmosphere is nice and quiet, the food is good. I had the half lobster with the salad, really tasty! It is a bit expensive though.
We turned up on spec and helpful staff found us a table. Good service, very good food and very good atmosphere. Success all round.
The place is well decorated with nice paintings. The food was inventive and the tastes were clear of heavy sauces. Service was great.
Had salmon for starters. Great. Angus tournedos for main course. Great. Only small problem is the horrible Pepsi Light instead of a Coke Zero - also known as 'Black Champagne' :) Just go there...
Great friendly service, served timely and catered to our needs. Excellent food, and great vegetarian dish for a predominantly steak restaurant.
Recommended and booked by our hotel. Great steak, chips and salad. Although I didn't have it, I was told the lobster was good too! The staff were also very friendly and efficient!

column3: great place for an easy meal
column4: great place - right around the corner from the Toren - actually ate their twice due to several days of pouring rain - and didn't want to venture too far for dinner - they did it very well on both occasions
The food is good and staff very nice- it can be a tight squeeze at night between tables and this caused an accident (b√©arnaise sauce all over my partner's trousers, shoes and coat!)

Ate here tonight on recommendation from a friend. Loved it. The service was attentive but not obtrusive. The waitstaff are knowledgeable and had great wine pairing suggestions. They even called me a cab which was waiting outside when i was ready to leave

What a great place this is. For starters we had the coquilles and the carpaccio, which was very good. Did have the Black and bluesteak as main-dish. Don't doubt , just go there. Fine service, friendly people....
We had a nice meal here with really tasty steaks and a good bottle of red wine. Overall a pleasant evening, we would go again.

Inexperienced waitresses who looked pretty but had little concept of customer service. The restaurant was ordinary and the food overpriced. My lobster was tasteless, the steak was good but the salad and chips were dull. All hype and no substance.
If you search for a good burger or a good Steak you will be at the right Place ...... Its worth a visit.... The Service is also verry good...
Visited on spec after sober time at Anne Franke house.Great food and atmosphere, and wonderful service from Gilly and the rest of the crew. Will definitely return üòÑ
Great food, and burgers. Great service, fast and good sides. I like the drink menu. The location is quite nice as well.

A local favorite and short walk from Canal House. Definitely for meat lovers! Steak for two with french fries and salad was terrific. Burger was large and well prepared. All were cooked perfectly to order
The food was very good although my steak was a bit dry outside. The service was very friendly and nice.
The restaurant has an amazing ribs and a tasty lobster with a high level of service. The price is good and the environment is very kin

Very good meal. Best fries on our trip. We were sold on coming to this restaurant when we walked by and the hostess offered free samples of that day's soup -- potato, leek, artichoke. Delicious. All dishes quite good. Good vibe.

We chanced upon this restaurant after our visit to the Anne Frank's house and we were glad we did. The Black and Blue Steak was delicious. Staff was friendly and we had the perfect dinner to end the day.
Food was very good, waitress did not rush us as we shared a bottle of wine and just wanted to decompress after a busy day. Very pretty as well.
We enjoyed steak, fries and salad served a unique way with unlimited fry basket and salad served in a mason jar. Steak was juicy, tender and flavorful and cooked perfectly.

column3: Casual stop from a long Walk
column4: Very good food, pleasant serviced. Stopped for an afternoon app'ies but would recommend for dinner with an atmosphere that couples could enjoy over a great meal. Only minutes walk from everything.
Had the best lunch in a long time. Beautifully set out restaurant and the young lady who served us could not be faulted. Looking forward to my next trip to Amsterdam and some more great food.

Went there for lunch got smoked salmo and beef tartare from the lunch menu. Service didnt seem very motivated even though it was quite empty. Food was okay but way overpriced considering how empty the plates were
Seldom got a so perfect steak. Fine meat made "at the point". Also the starters like the lobster had been very good üòä

We happened upon this lovely little bistro late in the day. Our feet needed a glass of wine and we stayed for supper! Thoroughly enjoyed sitting streetside and watching the people go by while we enjoyed our meal. Highly recommend the mussels and the steak.

column3: Fabulous burgers in a really cool setting
column4: The burgers and fries were amazing. The venue was both hip and warm. The waitstaff were wonderful. And all ten of us enjoyed our late-evening, post Anne Frank house tour, dinner.

Wait staff were friendly and spoke English as well. The food is amazing, steak is perfectly cooked, and they accommodated my wheat allergy with gluten free bread. Also some of the best fries (chips, frittes) I've had.

Ate with friends, a very nice restaurant with friendly and attentive staff and great food. Definitely worth a visit also handy for the Anne Frank museum.
Nice casual but hip spot with relaxed service. Food was delicious, esp the fennel soup and polenta vegetarian plate. Good recommendation, near Anne Frank House.
Amazing atmosphere, amazing service, amazing food, just a perfect experience overall. Glad we took shelter from the rain in here!
fabulous food and nice atmosphere although it was a bit noisy.......that is all I really want to say about this.....

column3: Was recommended to us but fell short
column4: Service was slow. Waited 1 hour 20 minutes between appetizer and main. Our orders were undercooked. Still undercooked after sent back. Ordered roasted vegetables but did not receive.
Really enjoyed our three course meal here at about 50 Euros each including wine. Great buzz and friendly staff. Worth trying.
the food was fabulous!! Staff was wonderful and spoke English. Communication was never difficult in Amsterdam.
A delicious lunch option... The salad with steak and goat cheese was perfect. Food was perfectly prepared and service was very friendly.
Very good food that was well prepared and thought out. the hamburger was divine. Very nice staff and unpretentious atmosphere.

Service was wonderful, food was delicious. We ordered steak for two and oir friend got beef tartar. We all liked our food, and portions were just right. Price was very reasonable. Beautiful place! We loved it! Wish we could go again.

column3: Great tastes along with great sevice... priceless!=)
column4: Visited with freinds had the rib eye and the lental soup to die for... and ended with a french toast suprise for dessert. !! Will be back !
Enjoyed a great steak with my family while waiting for our timed tickets to Ann Frank house. The catch of the day was also very good. Service and food were excellent.
Highly recommend, popped in for a light lunch. Great prices and food was Devine. Female waitress was also very attentive despite having a busy restaurant - not always easy to do!
The customer service was excellent but the food was not so good. It can be improved. But on the average i would give a good note if you want to have a pleasant moment.
It was devine!!! We got the steak and our reaction was like "Wow!!!" We also got the salmon and it was delicious!! Definitely recommended!!! It was well presented and very delicious.
My wife and I had the lunch 'sampler' I and it was a perfect amount of food to hold us over for quite some time. Great staff, too!
Staff is really kind and funny! Dishes are delicious. Hamburger and beef steak are very good! I racommend it to you hardly the dessert 'death of chocolate'...
We had an amazing dinner at this restaurant. We both had steak which were nicely presented and cooked perfectly. Definitely our favourite dinner in Amsterdam.
Very nice and comfortable restaurant. Relaxed interior. Really quick service and nice waitresses. Everything was good!
Brilliant food, lovely atmosphere and well priced, also a good selection of wine, oh and don't forget the helpful service.
My partner enjoyed a relaxed coffee and beer here. The staff were very friendly and didn't mind at all that we weren't eating. They were very attentive and the venue is beautiful
Stopped here for a quick lunch before leaving the city. Nice Burger and good service. A good option for either lunch or dinner. Friendly staff too.
Had dinner in this restaurant. Reservations no problem. Food was excellent. Would go back again. Staff were very attentive and courteous.

After visiting the anne frank museum, we've decided to have lunch and we found this place here on Tripadvisor. We ordered a focaccia as an entry and then two dishes of american steak, everything was very good.

Food is ok, good value. But nothing special - I guess it¬¥s a good meal for the price. Drinks are very good though, and the atmosphere is nice. Nice place to start a night out with friends etc. Service is excellent.

Great stop for an hour this afternoon , I had coffee and lemon meringue , partner had coffee and macaroon ! Very pleasant restaurant and lunch and evening menu looked very appetising too ! definately revisit , staff friendly !
Very good meat restaurant, everything was super tasty and I loved the macaroon served with the coffee :) Would definitely go back and recommend :D

My friends and I went to Black and Blue for dinner and enjoyed a really good meal. The staff was friendly and efficient and the food was great. Loved the soup and the steak and fries were amazing. Don't think twice about going.

column3: Perfect for a steak - you local but upscale rest

Went here with a group of friends, the beef (rib eye for 2 persons) is extremely delicious! Will definately come here again

Stumbled across this restaurant just by accident and thoroughly enjoyed. Friendly and efficient staff in a very comfortable and modern atmosphere. We only stopped for coffee but had some delicious apple cake as well. All served with a smile.

column3: Amazing steaks, good prices and friendly staff

This place has a lovely atmosphere and staff. The food was very good, the scallops and steaks being exceptional. We thought it was also excellent value for money.
TA says I have to write. min of 100 characters so working to reach that. I hide a nice experience here. Great soup, and atmosphere. lovely

The concierge recommended this place the night we arrived. It has a lovely atmosphere, great food, nice staff. It was a nice way to start our vacation.
Casual work dinner, food was good, service distinctly average. As I commented to the boss, "it's nice to see people happy in their work." Just not here....

this is really charming restaurant with very nice, comfortable and warm interior. food is perfect, not too expeny and they are using really good ingrediaces. location is also very good, you will easily find it.

column3: This is great and charming restaurant.

column3: Great food, for a good price!

This restaurant is fairly new but the staff make you feel very welcome and like you're in safe hands for the evening. The steak was lovely and not too pricey. Would recommend.
New place in the center of Amsterdam, modern interior, the food was fresh and tasty, wide range of good wines.

column3: Found this place while roaming around
column4: Lovely modern restaurant with interesting appetizers and entrees. The surroundings are very pleasant and all of the wait staff were friendly, pleasant & helpful.
Very good food, i had a burger and it was superb. The interior is modern and has a cosy feel. Friendly staff and a nice menu.

column3: Unexpected find in Amsterdam for lunch

Greatest steak I‚Äôve ever had, plus awesome service. Would recommend to anyone, Looking forward to visiting again
TDQ Steaks is to die for. Great steaks and awesome staff! Highly recommend! Definitely going back!!!

I went travelling in Europe and this restaurant was my favourite. The steaks were great quality and the ambience was excellent. I highly recommend!

Had such a great night with friends and the staff went over and above to accommodate us. I‚Äôll admit we were potentially difficult customers with complicated orders but the staff were professional and made our evening one to remember :)
An accidental find, but steak was melt in your mouth amazing and the service was excellent. The owner was super lovely. Would love to visit again
A really good steakhouse if you‚Äôre not to many people, restaurant is small an can handle groups up to 10-15 persons at one table. Steaks is fantastic and chef‚Äôs are doing a really good job.

Super yummy steaks cooked perfectly. The staff were so lovely and very professional. Would definitely recommend a bus if you love steaks.
Love this place, beste steakhouse ever and amazing staff. Allot of different meat options and nice sidedishes.
Nice friendly restaurant with delicious steaks on meny.Friendly and helpful waiters.Absolutely recommended
very good meat, a pleasant environment! But the true heart of the restaurant is the maid Sebiana, a simple and intelligent girl, thanks for letting us have a great evening!

Since I get to visit Amsterdam once every month, following recommendation from a friend, I ended up going there every time I am in the city. Great food and value for money. Whether sitting outdoor or indoor, its deffinitely worth visiting üëç

Lovely food , steaks cooked perfect üëåüèª , nice staff very polite , helpful and knowledgeable. Even gave us a gift with out knowing it was our anniversary thanks TDQ AMSTERDAM

Best steak I ever had must visit if you are in Amsterdam, staff was incredible knowledgeable for all the foods and yummy desserts.
Great food!Great management!Great service!Great feriendly atmosphere. Thanks to the team for this lovely experience!

Went there tonight with my son ,we were recommended very good choice of steak ,side dish is excellent ,service is really good . The place itself is comfortable and we really liked everything. This is a high quality restaurant and worth the price .

Very good steak, delicious!! The quality is excellent. The Terrace in the summer is very nice and comfortable. I will highly recommend this place! Also the neighborhood is pleasant. Bon Appetite

You will never each a tastier rib eye than at this restaurant! Great service too. GO THERE! You won‚Äôt be disappointed!
Try the small 100 gm steak with different countries of origin The desert is very professional It‚Äôs one of best steak restaurants
All I can say is the best steak I have ever had, staff where polite and very accommodating. Will be going back
Literally the best steaks I‚Äôve ever had. This restaurant has the quality of product and service at a world class level. Keep it up!

I visited this restaurant with my colleagues and it was amazing! As a pescatarian, I don't eat meat but they had a very nice salmon dish which I enjoyed. And the service was great! the staff was very kind and professional.
We went with colleagues for a staff dinner, everything was nice and tasty. Very friendly staff as well :) worth to visit ! Art‚Äôotel :)
Really nice food and very pleasant service. Worth the price. The steaks were perfectly grilled and also the side dishes were delightful. Would love to come back.
The steak was really amazing and well seasoned! We had a fantastic time celebrating our work meeting. The staff was very attentive, will return!!

column3: Great steakes, fries, salads and souces
column4: Fantastic steak, good service, small terace upfront. We did not wait a lot. Prices a bit high (steaks from 20+eur, side dish included)
Had a great time eating at TDQ Steaks with my friends! Very good and friendly service and amazing food
Near our hotel on a side street - wonderful Argentinian steak place !! Loved the staff. 5 stars great wine list. Great side dishes

The steak was absolutely delicious, cooked sublimely and just great quality. I also really loved the sides and sauces, in particular the truffle sauce. A little pricey but that is to be expected with steak.
Best steak I have ever had. Not cheap but worth it. Staff friendly and helpful. We were seated quickly, drink order was taken and we were given enough pre dinner time to complete.
This is the best steak restaurant in Amsterdam. You can get steaks from New Zealand, Japan, Argentina, Scotland and many more. Cooked to perfection. Wonderful service maps
The waiters and waitresses are very polite and friendly. They are very familiar with the menu and give their personal recommendation. Food is excellent.
We called and went for a late dinner and had a nice surprise. The choices of meat is very good and they certainly know how to grill. Excellent service and nice atmosphere. Recommended.
We had a good evening in this restaurant. Meat was tender and tasteful. Location was also very central and close to train station.

This was really one of the highlights of our trip! Truly lovely food, good recommendations for both wine and extras, and last but not least; a very forthcoming staff. You can‚Äôt go wrong with a visit here!

Been twice and booked for this Saturday. Good menu and service. Our hotel recommended it a couple off years ago. Good choice
Unreal steak and cooked the way you ask for it. It's expensive but very tasty food. Would go again üëçüèº
The steaks are really good and tasty! The owner and his son are very gentle!! Good luck in London and al the best!

For meat lovers this is the place. A great variety of steaks from different countries. The place is very cozy in a calm area and the staff is very helpful.Highly recommended
It was my third time in Toro Dorado, steak was perfect, service was amazing, can't wait to visit again.

I had a good experience from the food till the personnel which was very helpful and hospitable. The girl that served us made sure that our steaks were as we order them.

column3: Every body run to the castle and the nucht vacht

This was an amazing find, the food was fantastic as was the service by Trang, couldn‚Äôt fault anything.
Wow just incredible the black gold cooked to perfection and recommended by the waiter , lovely relaxed atmosphere thank you üòä
Did eat an excellent Argentinian Steak of 250 gr. Very well cooked with an excellent tast. Service is good and attentive to get you quickly your drinks.
I pay big money for one steak, as my friends also, but steak wasnt so good.. was more medium well than medium, and i order medium.
Fancied some meat and this place was ideal. The steak was cooked exactly how I like it and the wine menu also good. Great service too and we loved it here.
I had two good meals from 7 sept to 9 sept,first night salmon,Rack of Lamb 2nd Bison Canadian Carmen Creek,3rd Rack of Lamb,sever were great clean food was gooooooooooood.
Good stake and a friendly stuff . Nice welcome. The wine was tasty. And the stake was very good. We will be back

Great restaurant. The steak was cooked beautifully and melted in the mouth. Wonderful side orders, all delicious. Perfect meal

Amazing selection of delicious and tasty beef and meat. Wine is really good. Deserts are memorable. I‚Äôm highly recommending this place, you won‚Äôt regret it. Cons: a little bit expensive but not if you take into consideration food quality. Service could be better.

Few of us friends found this gem by acccident and were so glad we came across this ..Absolutely loved everything that we ordered , crab cakes were flavoursome, steak was really tender and one of the best I've ever had.
I absolutely loved the experience I had when I visited toro dorado.The waiters were lovely and the food was amazing.I will be sure to return when I next go to Amsterdam!!.

over for a business trip staying at the kimpton, i indulged in quality steak from Toro dorado. the waiters were welcoming and the service superb. Must visit for a Lucious steak.

We were a family party of 6 seniors who love good steak. We weren't disappointed. Excellent quality, reasonable price, quality professional service. Will definitely return

Really beautiful steaks, fantastic service. Weather was nice so could sit outside which was lovely. The waitress showed us each cut of meat to help us make a choice. Great menu. Really enjoyed the herb butter and pepper sauce. 10/10.
Best steak ever and super great atmosphere, super sauces and nice service!!! I would go again and totally recommend!!!
Another magnificent meal with superb service. Dined outside weather was perfect and the steaks were cooked to perfection.
Best meal we had in Amsterdam!!! The food was delicious, staff very friendly and patient( we had way to many questions üòä). Overall experience- GREAT

column3: Best Steak house restaurant in Amsterdam!

Here a lot when visiting ams! Great service and great steaks - personally i come for the postcards and the marshmellows üòã
Claudia and Kelly did a great job in making my dinner great. It was fast to get a table. Food in time to my pace while working and always warm.
Located in Marriott Hotel. Excellent service and top-quality grass fed beef. A little pricey, but good value for the money.
Had the 300gm sirloin. It was perfectly cooked (medium). Gino and Claudia gave great service, the Caesar was delicious with extra cheese and croutons. Really enjoyed it all.

What a fabulous setting and great food the best steaks we think we have ever had cooked to perfection. The service by Rodrigo & Bernardo was terrific, really fun guys which topped off the whole experience

column3: Excellent Staff!!!. Rodrigo you are the Best in Class.
column4: Wonderful food and more than gentle staff. I go very often for business. Relaible quality,no surprises, the best meat in town for sure. Rodrigo is a discovery, he speaks all languages. even Spanish and Mexican that actually are not the same.
Morning BUFFETT excellent. Eveneing meal was extra special. Even had marshmellows to roast to close out the evening. STEAKS could not have been better.

column3: Accommodating, does fish well for a steak house
column4: The staff here was the most unified staff I have ever seen. They work so well together not a beat was missed.
Food and service were amazing. Thank you Claudia and Jan. Steaks cooked to perfection. Wonderful wine on offer.
The ambient is nice, the service good, the food was good, but not special...but overpriced .... Sorry just it is.... ...
Although a bit expensive you pay for what you get. And you get excellent prepared beef with fantastic service. Kelly and Carmen couldn't be anymore perfect hostesses.

service and food absolutely flawless. best steak I have ever had. also the creamy spinach is a must! our party of 4 would be quite picky with food and there was not one negative thing to say. top notch food!!
The Resturant offers selective stake menu with very nice setups and great location. The price is relatively high but the food is great and the waiters are very friendly.
Virkelig god betjening hele vejen igennem. Helt sikkert et bes√∏g v√¶rd. Ogs√• igen n√¶ste gang. Nice dinner all the Way. Great service. Would choose it again anytime.
We had another Great dinner at the Midtown Grill, With Service from Claudia, Gino and Rodrigo. Delicious food from the Chef Raif and Matthijs. See you next Monday, Hans en Martijn

The meats were excellent. Perfectly cooked, as requested. However 110‚Ç¨ for 2 steaks 1 salad 2 side dishes 1 dessert and 3 glasses of beer are too much. Something around 90‚Ç¨ would be more reasonable

High end restaurant with good food. Our first trip to Amsterdam and first resturant we ate at. We had no reservations but they took us anyway. Gina and Glaudia were our servers. Great food and service. Definitely recommend.

Welcoming restautant with decor, furnishings and lighting making a relaxed and inviting atmosphere. The beef was very good, excellently cooked and served with good accompaniments. Thank you to both, Orhan and Rodrigo who served us and helped to make a very memorable evening.
Very good ambience, service and steak! The location is just next to Marriott Hotel. I would say just go and try it out!
Excellent Steaks! Particularly appreciated the upbeat, clear, and genuinely friendly answers to our questions from an excellent waiter named Rodrigo.

With so many options in this wonderful city, the Midtown Grill did not disappoint. Meat grilled to perfection, attentive staff and comfortable surroundings made for a memorable meal. Girol and Claudia--thanks for the good time!
Love the steaks. Dutch steak and American steaks are both awesome. Service was great, prompt and polite. Pleasant atmosphere and great location in Amsterdam
It is just next to the Vondel Park, we went there a bit earlier than our booking. Ordered steak (dutch cut) and ribs. The quality of the food is good, service is also decent.
one of the best steaks I have ever had and the staff is extremely friendly and helpful. A must for all steak lovers who sometimes like also a surf and turf!!! We'll visit again üòÑ

An exceptional meal was served to us during a recent visit to the Midtown. Service was first class and the food was excellent. An altogether enjoyable experience. Not cheap but well worth it. Would recommend
super steak house...... definitely specialising in meat. Although the menu offers seafood I would go for the steaks every time

Food was great, the New York Sirloin is recommend. Staff could only communicate in English? Only the hostess was Dutch, but ordering was done in English. Fine for tourists, just plain weird for locals. But I guess that's what Amsterdam is now.
Steaks were fantastic but price was high as it was part of the Marriott Hotel. Best to book in advance.
We loved our steak dinner at Midtown Grill. Best steaks ever! Very friendly atmosphere, a bit pricey, but well worth it!

Was there to enjoy a great meal! But was surprised that the meals (main course and dessert) was so tasty and delicious! The service was outstanding! There is also a bonus meal included ;) Lovely place!
The food at the restaurant of the Marriott hotel is very good , but it is extremely noisy. We almost had to shout to understand each other.
Great steaks, excellent service, warm atmosphere, high value for money: a place to stay in Amsterdam, for business as well as for leisure
Attentive, pleasant staff. Large menu but heavily biased towards steak. Excellent Caesar salad. Food well presented.

been there with a group related to my work . the food is very good , the portions are nice and looks lovely . I have no idea if it was because of the hour but the waiters were not very patient . shame .
You really need to go there, let yourself be treated by the friendly Rodrigo, let him advise on what meet is there to eat and you'll see what I'm talking about.

Very nice place located at the Marriott hotel in Amsterdam. Had filet mignon which was cooked to perfection and it almost melted in your mouth. The service was excellent and very friendly. Will definately go there again next time I'm in Amsterdam.
Spectacular burger, Sayat is the best waiter there. Good beer, good music and a good price, next to the Vondelpark, at the Marriott hotel. See you here !
...at EUR 9 for a bottle of water it's a disgrace. American style food and service which makes for a good evening.
the steak is perfectly prepared and the service is friendly. the price if not cheap is at least reasonable.
Food and service were superb. They even gave us a postal card to send greetings from Amsterdam to our relatives.

column3: Reminiscent of steakhouses in the US
column4: It's not a huge place, but very comfortable. Some tables for two are very close together. Still, they manage to put Americans close, so they can chat. Food is very good, and the service is excellent. Can't complain at all. Went back twice.
The food great. The service perfect. They tried to make it look like a Manhattan restaurant including S'mores at the end of the meal.

column3: Best new york cheese cake ever!
column4: Visit often Amsterdam. And one dinner is reserved for midtown grill rest. Real pleasant place. Great service, clean, great high quality and fresh food, and best new york style cheese cake.

Typical hotel restaurant in terms of decor, but a personable and collaborative staff makes for attentive and friendly service. Excellent dry-aged steaks, less effective side dishes. Small but selective wine list.

column3: For a good steak there is only 1 address in town
column4: Incidentically we ended up eating here. And I am very happy we ended up over here!! What a steak and not only the steak, no the salad as well as the fries as well. Quality and quantity well matched. Price/ value ratio very very good.

My girlfriend and I treated ourselves to steak and champagne during a recent stay in Amsterdam. The staff were great, very pleasant and helpful, the food delicious and the free wine (with Holland pass) made for a special evening. Highly recommended.
I was recommended this restaurant by a local newspaper, and definitely would agree that they have some of the best steaks in town. It was the taste of back home! Loved every bit(e) of it!
did a group menu for an Indian lunch and dinner. all was excellent .. very prompt refills and great service .. Highly recommended!!
Excellent wine choices, great Steak selections, Food is excellent in this restaurant and definitely worth stopping if you are looking for a good steak!

Enjoyed several breakfasts and dinners at this restaurant. Received great service by Rodrigo and Claudia. A treat to have American Food in a strange city. Steaks came from Kansas, Lobster from Maine, and New York Cheese Cake.
Great queens day dinner Excellent filet mignon and roasted potatoes Good wine selection Superb apple pie

column3: Ehhh Steaks are done better by others
column4: As an American, a steak craving can get you down pretty fast. In desperate need of a good steak, I thought the Marriott would perk us up.. sadly not. The steaks were pretty average.... I guess it's off to Hard Rock next time?
Nice environment, great grilling, quality ingredients, good service in a central location of the old city of Amsterdam. A bit overpriced, perhaps.
Great choice and good location but at ¬£27 it was expensive. Go for the included deal with the Marriot
you must try the carpaccio, the chef in front of you cuts it fresh and hammer it out! where else do you see this? dry aged meat prepared on the broiler is trully amazing!
Pre-Dinner Cocktails in bar, service, wine & food was all really really good. Great restaurant, next time I'm in Amsterdam I will be in returning 100%
perfect steak - dont need to say any more. service is just perfect as well. You have to pay the price (I have paid 65EUR) but overall the experience is perfect

Prompt service (very important when dining alone on a business trip), great steak cooked exactly as asked. The mushrooms were the large flat variety cooked to perfection with some jus added - delicious ! Overall very good if a little pricey.

column3: Good spot if you're staying at the Marriott
column4: Good selection of food on the menu. It's attached to the Marriott so it's convienient from that perspective. Prices are middle of the road, and good value for portion sizes.
Good meat and food in general. Wine-list is ridiculously limited, poor quality-level and a ripoff. It is not up to the standard of the food.

column3: Great steaks, super breakfast and excellent service.
column4: Midtown Grill at the Marriott is an excellent restaurant. Loved the eggs benedict with salmon for breakfast. Top notch food and service if you are looking for something a bit more Americanized and upscale.
Fantastic bone-in rib. Service is top notch. Relaxing environment. Destination restaurant! Have the bread and pudding to end the meal.

I wasn't sure about going to this restaurant as it does not look that appealing on the outside. However, not at all what I expected! Good atmosphere, delicious prawns and steak. Service was good, would recommend.
All was perfect, it would have been nice if there were more people in there though. Service = spot on Steak = could cut with a fork (dribble)

column3: Two good meals here during a 5 night stay.
column4: I ate twice here while staying at the Marriott Hotel. Overall food quality was very good and I opted for the accompanying wines on one visit and was pleased with the selections. The staff were very friendly, knowledgable and attentive. A good experience!
delicious. There are many Turkish working. Perfect breakfast
:) liked it, enjoyed it with my co-coworkers. Would go back!
Steaks are absolutely great in this place! The atmosphere is very pleasant, service is excellent, desserts are delicious
The food was superb but as the restaurant got busier, the service got poorer as we were forgotten.
good steakhouse with a kids menu. Located in the Marriott Hotel. Nice location.

column3: top quality steaks, the best service, nice atmosphere
column4: friendly and exceptional service the best steaks in Holland Pleasant atmosphere What I liked more? For sure the steaks. I don't know how exactly they grill the steaks but the waiter told us that they grill the steaks at 1000 Celsius. Tender and so juicy.

If this is what you are after in Amsterdam, Midtown Grill offers up a decent steak and American-type sides. It's a bit pricey. So it probably appeals to unadventurous Americans on an expense account, or maybe those looking to try such an experience.

column3: attentive service, excellent variety and quality
column4: Friendly prompt service, offering suggestions when asked about availability and quality of meal items ... special requests handled with a smile ... we all felt very comfortable and enjoyed the food.

column3: Steak heaven in het heart of Amsterdam
column4: Ambiance wise it might be a 'classic' chain hotel restaurant but if you are longing for a really good steak this is the place. Entering you see the eye-catcher, a trolley with available cuts of the day. From soft Filet Mignon to big tasty Porter...More

I ate here 3 times - once for dinner and twice for breakfast. The scallop & risotto as well as the smoked salmon & herb toast appetizers - all excellent. My baby roasted chicken was a tinge on the dry side. Nonetheless, the potatoes and the Puglia wine pairing made up for it. My companions thought their food was excellent.  This is a visually appealing restaurant, situated slightly below ground. The tall windows allow you to people watch. I feel that this restaurant (among other things) made the hotel a better choice to stay at, partly due to the fact that the quality of the food was comparable to other fine dining choices in Amsterdam. Therefore, if you're stuck at the hotel due to weather or suffering from jet lag, this makes it easy.

what an excellent place.. Glad I chose it for my groups dinner of 40 guests.  Nothing was too much trouble.. Great ambience, service , good food being the icing on the cake. Had a 3 course menu.  Mirielle our maitre d" was brilliant and had all the answers.  Highly recommended for excellent steaks!!!

column3: One of the best Steakhouse outside the Midwest
column4: Being from the Chicago area we usually avoid steakhouses when traveling, especially when out of the USA, preferring local specialties. We consider our local corn fed beef to be among the best in the world-so why go to Holland to have steak! Since the restaurant was in our hotel and we were still a little jet lagged-we gave it a try especially after striking out on a local highly rated restaurant the prior night. Wow-what a surprise-the steaks were among the best we have had-including those at the better chains in the US-Gibson's or Ruth Chis's. The service and ambiance matched the meal.
