Great steak with the best chimichurri sauce! People working there were so so sweet and attentive. The caramel flan is AMAZING! & don‚Äôt leave without trying the Malbec house wine!
Best place in town. Everything super fresh, super tastefull and supergood prepared. Amazing. Also very nice staff and really good wine.its a must go if you‚Äôre in amsterdam...

We had the most fantastic steak during our weekend trip to Amsterdam. The staff were attentive, friendly and very welcoming. And the Chimichurri steak sauce was out of this world. Highly recommend visiting as you won‚Äôt be left feeling disappointed.
We visitet La Luna earlier that evening and had a really nice stay! The service was super warm and friendly and the food was just delicious! We'd love to come back some day. Thank You :)
Was really pleasantly surprised- one of the best steaks I‚Äôve ever had. The host (I assume is the owner) was so friendly and enthusiastic & a credit to the restaurant. A true Argentinan steakhouse!

Came to la luna in a group of 14 and got seated exceptionally fast. The service was brilliant and friendly. And the food was the best we are our entire trip. Really brilliant and the brides had a lovely time. Thanks guys.
It is one of the best meals I had in Amsterdam. For steak Sure it is the best. Also they are very gentle.. very friendly.. Staff is amazing.. They made my Day .. I realy enjoy my time
All I can say is WOW. The food, staff and the atmosphere was amazing. The staff were so lovely and bubbly! The food was delicious, fast service and lots of food on the plate! Highly recommend!
We went again there in La Luna really 5 star perfectly steak so friendly staff warm feeling. Just amazing
The food was excellent and the staff were great. We would good here again and will recommend it to friends and everyone in Amsterdam.

column3: Best service of any restaurant I have visited in years....
column4: Great Argentinian steak. Excellent service. Great location. I really felt like the staff cared about my experience here, how refreshing.
Best place to have a dinner. A fresh meat, a very good taste and best staff Very recommended for any type of visit

Food was delicious we both had steak and chips which was cooked perfectly and the pepper corn sauce was amazing! Man who served us was extremely polite and nice. Would defiantly return and recommend for a good steak

In general the service was too slow from the start to the end. It took some time before they took our order, but whenever they first was with our t table they where pretty happy and smiling. The food was average, nothing special about it.
Excellent food and first class service. I would highly recommend this restaurant for a great steak. Not a cheap meal but definitely worth the price we paid. By far the best meal we had in Amsterdam.
I order the burger and it was very small and taste like a shoe... The meal was overprice and they even chrage 2 euro on the BBQ sauce.
Service tried to compensate the poor food. Beef filet poor quality, fries with old fat taste and sauces out of convenience pack!

Found this place by accident and had a wonderful time! Michael, our server, recommended a great vegetarian option so the rest of my party could enjoy amazing steak! The vegetable empenadas were excellent. We would go again!

column3: One of the best meat I ever ate
column4: Great service and wonderful food the best meat I ever ate,The owner is kind and friendly and always smiles

Good food but nothing special. Didn‚Äôt cook all the steaks how they were requested but the sides were good and the service was... enthusiastic. Fine place to eat but definitely not a ‚Äúmust‚Äù for your trip to Amsterdam.

We visits on Sunday 28th April 2019 after my friend recommended we eat here. The service was great, Mario is lover and friendly. The food was so nice best meal we had during our break. Thanks again . See you next year!

Steaks were lovely but side orders not. Jacket potato was hard inside. Mushrooms a bit undercooked. Also could hear staff talking about customers, as it was so quiet, please don‚Äôt assume your customers only speak one language !
Came here on our last night in Amsterdam and it was a gorgeous steak, well priced and 10/10 for customer service !! Highly recommend.

What a great restaurant amazing steaks and super friendly staff Nothing was too much trouble I'll be back next time I visit Amsterdam Thanks for finishing off our break on a high P.S the rib eye is so good
We enjoyed our dinner here - food was great italian (and i am a NYC italian) so cudo's to the cheff !! The service and ambience was wonderful
Very nice service, the food is very good and the price is exactly right. When near Museumplein / Leidseplein make sure you eat your steaks here!
Myself and my partner had a lovely meal here. The steaks were delicious and staff members extremely welcoming and friendly, would definitely return.

Atmosphere very welcoming and the food was fantastic! Highly recommend the filet steak. The staff were wonderful! Very attentive and jovial. The manager even helped me with my jacket as we were leaving - absolute gent. 11/10 would definitely visit again
We had dinner here last night and the steaks were great but the service was even better. Very friendly, personalised and made the evening really special for my youngest daughter. Thank you.
Had a really nice meal here and the staff were great - looked after us well. Would go again! The ribs in particular were really nice.
Friendly atmosphere. Had the filet which was perfectly cooked along with corn and mushrooms which were the perfect finishing touch.
Very tender Argentinian steak.Really enjoyed our dinner. Also very friendly staff. We recommend to all visiting Amsterdam.Rita and Vincent from Malta.
We've enjoyed eating there, the Argentinean filet steak was made perfectly . Moreover, the service was was useful and friendly.
My husband and I visited this restaurant for his birthday meal. The staff were lovely and decorated his chair. Both had fillet steak which was amazing. Would definitely go back if in Amsterdam.
Great restaurant. Mega delicious. Totally friendly staff. The food did not last long and the service is great. Tasted good and we will gladly come again.

column3: Best Steak and really nice service
column4: The place is amazing from all sides - the service and staff is really good and friendly, place is really cozy and authentic, and there were THE BEST STEAKS me and my wife have eaten so far in our entire lifes! :)
With family and friends been there for dinner. Excellent steaks, and amazing service. They were very kind and generous.
Good steakhouse:) The meat, fries, and the service was good. the salad could be better and they don‚Äôt have bearnaise:(:(
One of the best steaks, I visited it last year and this year , same quality and nice atmosphere, keep up

I would totally recommend this restaurant, the food is great , freshly cooked and delicious service was excellent our waiter Michael was very attentive and pleasant, staff very friendly !! We ordered the mix grill , portion are quiet big .
Thanks La Luna it is the best place ever best steak and service you never find restaurant like la luna in Amsterdam

A great little steak house that we discovered using the trip advisor app whilst away. Good quality, well cooked meat and very reasonably priced. When we return to Amsterdam we will, without doubt, return here to eat.
Delicious meal with Mendoza Malbec, first day in town and a bit jet-lagged but navigated our way by foot easily and enjoyed the out-door cafe option.
Steak was good but charged for items not asked for and were quite expensive. Charged over 20 euro for small serving salad and chips we never asked for. Be careful what you order and check your bill!

Visiting Amsterdam in a larger group sometimes makes tables difficult, but La Luna were incredibly accommodating. Friendly service, and fantastic steak, coupled with a reasonable Malbec meant for a great meal, which proved reasonable on the wallet too.

column3: Very good steak and kind people
column4: We went there for dinner and had steak, chips, salad and beer. The place is comfy and well located and the food was well done and good quality. The personelle is very kind and welcoming, that is this city is not so common. High recommended
The restaurant was really good. The food was tasty and the service was very friendly. I would definitely go there again.
We where in Amsterdam for 4 nights and went to La Luna two times. It was great both times, best steak I have had and great service

Really loved this restaurant. Great food and service. So unusual to find a restaurant that actually cares for their customers needs. Really great experience would return during my next stay in Amsterdam
Fantastic steaks!! I will really recommend this steakhouse to all steaks lovers. Very tender steaks and good mushroom sauce The staff were very friendly and service minded. Lovely place!
Super friendly staff in restaurant and very delicious meal! The meat was good quality and fried how I have wished.
Was in Amsterdam for a training. Had diner at La Luna. The waiter was very enthousiastic, but not pushy. Steak was above average, but not the best i ever had. Nevertheless it is worth to eat here.
Really good steak house, staff is friendly and polite. It is definitely a steak place therefore you must order steak to have this good experience
Amazing people, amazing food, La Luna never fails to amaze!!! Their passion for food can be tasted in every mean and their hospitality is deeply felt!!!

Going to keep this review short. Food extremely nice and tasty. Waiters/owner Very friendly and nice. Only downfall for us was the price of every extra we got. It just made the bill extremely high. However with that said it was very nice.

Went here as a party of 16 and the guy was so lovley couldn't do enough for us and every dish was lovley and everyone complimented how great it was. I would definitely return. Thank you so much for a great night
Went here last night on a reservation for 16 people.the owner is a great guy,so friendly and helpful.food was delicious.will definitely return again.thank-you
Amazing food, the steak was cooked to perfection and attentive, friendly staff...had a great night, definitely going back to this restaurant when we next go to Amsterdam
It was a very lovley & friendly location with excellent Food. Our Steak was one of the best i ever had. Nice Location...
We visited here after seeing its fantastic rating on trip advisor- we weren‚Äôt disappointed! Steak was amazing and the staff were fab. It is pricey but definitely worth it! Highly recommended!
We came to La Luna a wery large group. Space was not a lot but we got so grate servise that we forgot about it :) Food was good and the staff grate :)
We went there because of the good rating but they fail to amuse us. Average food, overpriced. Many good steakhouse besides this.

The food is a little pricey as it was quite average though the food was enjoyed! I had an absolute lovely experience as the restaurant had a very friendly atmosphere and the staff showed a lot of passion towards customers and were extremely kind!
Food is ok but portions are a bit small. The price is quite expensive taking into account these. About 30 euros per person for a very basic meal. Also the atmosphere is not that great.
Went here last week. Was excellent service, ribs are simply amazing! Really a lovely spot and the staff are SO friendly!
friendly staff but overall this restaurant isn't really all that, The food was very average, not really worth the money. The local was cozy but the music was a little loud.
Excellent food, excellent service in a great atmosphere. The steaks were cooked to perfection. Would definitely recommend the restaurant.
Excellent service and food was incredible. Owner was a very warm and friendly guy! Would definitely recommend anyone to go here when they get the chance.
They take customers for idiots! Be aware of the extra dishes they propose to you! We weren't told that the sauces and the bread had to be paid for afterwards.

Read a few reviews and decided to try La Luna one evening. It was late and raining, but was worth running to this place. The service was friendly and the food was great. The steaks had wonderful flavor. Good wine selection, also.

Went with a friend at like 1am. Got amazing steak and really nice tapas!! Would totally recommend. Service is fantastic, got our food within 15 mins. Steak with pepper sauce is amazing! Honestly, as well as everything else. You will not regret coming here.
I have been here two times, it is one of the best steakhouse in the area. Good beers and very friendly place. One of the times there was live music excellent atmosphere, Recommended!

The worst restaurant I've been in ages... cheap atmosphere, meals were served in very cheap/broken plates, salad/side order was inedible, food very average... I do not understand why it has such high reviews here honestly... wouldn't recommend for my worst enemy
We went for a birthday and was looking for a good steak. There was a really nice atmosphere and the services was excellent, very accommodating. Good steak and wine, can definitely recommend.
All the family had a great time, excellent food and lovely staff, Argentinian style and hospitality all the way!

We visited Amsterdam couple of days ago and in the last night we had a wonderful dinner in LA LUNA restaurant.... Food was fantastic service very nice and MARIO the manager was top..... Thank you very much for everything!
I did love the food and the good service!!! Everything was perfect like i expected before i went at La Luna.

I had a killer ribeye here this past week. The owner is quite a character, and provided excellent service without being too intrusive. Prices are expensive, even for Amsterdam, but the steaks were large, well cooked, and excellently seasoned. Try the Chimchurri with your steak!

Family of 5, booked table after reviewing on Tripadvisor. We loved it! Perfect meat, nice sides. Only thing I did not appreciate was the vegetables - very soggy and overcooked. Stay away from these and the rest of the meal is fabulous. The staff is...More

Amsterdam is a city in which around every corner you will see a steakhouse. I went to La Luna on my second day in this city and I was really impressed. I had booked a table at 20:00 and arrived early but the owner or patron had no problem in accomodating me to my table. The menu is very well varied and there is a very good selection of starters. The Argentinian Fillet I ordered as a main course was cooked to perfection (medium/rare) and the side dishes very good. The owner wanted me to try their home made Chimichurri sauce since I had originally gone for a traditional peppercorn sauce and I really did not regret this because its awesome. I strongly suggest the place and I commend the owner who apart from being a character is really accomodating and makes you feel really at home.
I did love the food and the good service!!! Everything was perfect like i expected before i went at La Luna.

I had a killer ribeye here this past week. The owner is quite a character, and provided excellent service without being too intrusive. Prices are expensive, even for Amsterdam, but the steaks were large, well cooked, and excellently seasoned. Try the Chimchurri with your steak!

column3: Excellent steak house in the middle of Amsterdam !
column4: So we checked Tripadvisor and the wife found La Luna which was a short walk from our hotel. We booked in advance and it was very easy to find.  We sat on one of the tables outside as the weather was gorgeous.  We were greeted by a very friendly young man - our waiter ! He recommended a starter to share which was simply delicious.  I went for a 400gm T Bone ! medium well and Wifey had a Sirloin 200pm also medium well. Both cuts of meat were absolutely delicious and were cooked to perfection. We had a couple of sauces and fries.  Reasonable prices.  If you want some good steak, try this place out, you will not regret it !

I came here guided by tripadvisor. I was already a bit suspicious because it is in a very touristic area and usually restaurant for tourists are dangerous, because the trick is behind the corner. Either the quality of food or the price are usually not right for the quality and quantity you eat. This time the quality was acceptable, if the meat is argentinian and just flamed, it is very difficult to make it wrong. But it is unacceptable to pay 1 steak and 1 beer 50 euros! It is just unacceptable. And cannot be explained with a small plate of chips with low quality guscamole. The personnel is friendly but it is way too little to justify sucha crazy price. Avoid it!11

column3: the restaurant is okay but very expensive and touristic
column4: We went to this restaurant for dinner to have some steaks. I expected this place to be much better because of the rating on tripadvisor. The restaurant is not bad, however it is expensive, touristic and dishes are not very good. It has nice terrace outside, and the staff is friendly.  However if you want to go for a steakhouse there are much better places in Amsterdam than this one.

Lovely little restaurant with amazing food, we had to queue to get in as it is so popular, but worth the short wait! Staff were friendly and everything tasted delicious. Definitely worth a visit if you're in Amsterdam, though may be worth booking to avoid dissapointment!

I regularly enjoy a nice steak in different places when i travel. Saw great reviews here so I had high expectations.  Ordered a 300g medium rare ribeye steak for 21 euros. It was OK - slightly dry, nice charcoal flavour.  Server highly encouraged me to order an extra sauce for 2 euros. I decided to try the Argentinian sauce - didn't like it. I feel like the sauce should be included in the price. 2 euros for tiny amount of sauce is a bit steep.  The side of grilled mushrooms were delicious. It was almost 3 euros for four mushrooms though.

column3: Great steak, the rest is so so
column4: Go here for the meat. The side dishes and starters are pretty boring and not so special. The staff is very friendly in particular the some what older Argentinian guy who I guess is the owner. And yes, it is in the hart of one of the most touristy streets in town, so do not expect any locals here and you do run the change to be seated next to a noisy stag party.
The best customer service ever,the beef was the finest quality.I highly recommend this place, it was the perfect place for dinner.
Absolutely great steak! Serving Argentine beef with friendly service. I recommend this and is definitely a restaurant I would go back to.
Try everything on the menu. Honest and affordable. Try the filet or t-bone. Also the local beer is a must.
Friendly, snug restaurant. Good home cooked steaks. Fresh rolls and homemade garlic butter. Regular waitress service so drinks flowed.
Good sized steak and good prices! Cooked a little over what I would cook myself but still delicious! Perfect for our last night in Amsterdam!

column3: Fantastic steak dinner and great staff
column4: This place was recommended to us and we were very pleased. Had a lovely steak meal very enjoyable. Staff very helpful and attentive especially manager really enjoyed our visit and if we lived closer would visit again
Very good dinner and fantastic atmosphere! Prices are good and the location is easy to reach! I recommend it!

column3: Fantastic Steak & Wine, whats not to love!
column4: I've always known Argentinian steak is the best but you have to try the Rib-Eye, it just melts in the mouth! Washed down with some very reasonably priced but mighty fine wines, there is nothing I didn't like!

Nice ambiance. Food was amazing! Had the argentinian fillet steak and my husband got the rib eye. Cooked perfectly. The only reasons fir the 4 stars instead of 5 was on the waiting time. It took us 40minute to get our onion soup out.
Called in for a meal before going on an evening canal cruise. Attentive service, lovely food and would definitely go there again.

This was our second choice of restaurants because our first choice was booked. We are SO lucky to have found this place. What a Gem! We loved Mario and thoroughly enjoyed all of the staff who participated in our experience! Highly recommend this place!!
La luna is simply fantastic!!!!!! Lovely owners, friendly staff and truly passionate about food. Their food is spectacular and the vibe is great! Definitely recommend!

We booked this restaurant for our first evening whilst on a hen weekend. They were the perfect hosts and the steaks were to die for. Would definately recommend. Staff were really friendly and we had a great time
We had incredible steak and grilled veg. Would definitely reccomend for meat dishes. Great service too. And excellent wines.
We went here on a whim and did not regret it. The food and service was amazing. The steak cooked perfectly and worth every penny
Walked in on a cold night. Starters were only ok... The steaks that followed were very good. Juicy and made to perfection. The waiters were very friendly and helpful.
The restaurant doesn't look to inspiring from the outside but once inside things look up. We had a truly fantastic entrec√¥te steak with fries and salad along with a bottle of Argentinian red. Heaven
The medium rare rump steak was pure gravy - absolutely perfect. The waiter was so positive and helpful. Thank you all.
I ordered a T Bone staek in it was owsome, Coocked perfectly and served fast The crew is really nice Also there red wine was excellent!
The food was amazing I had sirloin steak with fries and vegetables, it was cooked to perfection!!! The staff were very friendly and made my evening enjoyable. This restaurant is worth every penny.

Another hidden gem, food was fresh steak was awesome and staff where very very friendly. House red also very nice, bottle water seems to be in 1l bottles so be careful if u order a water. I would have visited every day for the steak
The service is extra extra slow. The spare ribs are good but the portions are a bit small. Maybe they were understaffed.

A solid steakhouse, with great service!! One of, if not the best restaurants I have been to. If possible, ask for the chimmichuri(?) sauce, a very spicy delicious sauce to pair with the steaks.. Will not hesitate to visit again!

Found this restaurant whilst looking on trip advisor. It most certainly exceeded all reviews. Fillet steak was delicious and the service and staff are very friendly and helpful. Would highly recommend.

Beautiful from start to finnish thoroughly recommend. Warm fresh bread and garlic butter it doesn't sound great but they even managed to make that taste really good. The Steak was out of this world and the Chimichurri wowww!
Service was amazing and the steak was cooked perfectly. All the sides were tasty too. We will definitely go back!
I read the review and I was probably too high in the expectations. Good meat. Nice service. Too small the restaurant.
Worth every penny!! The steak was amazing and the malbec was perfect !! Even the espresso was good. Enjoy!

An amazing atmosphere. Cozy vibe with good music, incredible service and friendly helpful people! As for the steak, best steak ever! The owner is lovely and he knows his steak inside and out and just loves explainitall the differences to people! Lovely place!

with one of the best steaks I ever ate! Delicious flavour in both steaks and cooked to perfection and accompanied with the hilarious and welcoming host "hola! Buenos noches!" Very authentic experience üòÇ highly recommended!
Great service, super friendly staff and delicious steak. I definitely recommend this restaurant.....

Amazing steak and drinks, lovely friendly service including a few freebies, decent prices and a really nice and warm feel to the place. This was the best meal of our three day trip and we'd 100% come back, definitely recommend!
Absolutely loved this place. I can honestly say it was the best steak I have ever had.! The staff were very friendly and attentive and the service and price were exceptional. Would highly recommend.

Our Dinner for two was lovely. Service was excellent providing good recommendations and all with a smile. Both stakes were perfect (fillet & ribeye). One comment: Charging 2 Euro for the side dressing is a bit high, should be included in the price.
Just finished a wonderful meal. Steaks cooked to perfection. Attention and service from staff was 2nd to none. Felt welcome especially by owners wife. We will be back, from the two Irish lads
Amazing amazing amazing the best steak we have ever eaten and we eat it a lot! Will defiantly be back that you from mr and mrs Fairbrass ‚ù§Ô∏è
Very nice Argentine food. The food is tasty The service was fast and with smile. The price was reasonable. I recommended to eat ther.

Went to la Luna after reading the reviews and it did not disappoint. Food was amazing, service was great with the staff being very attentive. Would recommend for couples as inside has a lovely vibe offering a sexual atmosphere.

Was looking for a nice steak restaurant, and came across this gem.. it's small, but has a nice Argentinean feel.. steak was good quality and cooked to perfection.. The staff offer you everything and are always on hand to help..
The steak was beautiful and delicious. their service was great. I had the best red wine and dessert too.
Me and my wife had the meat empenadas, was OK. Then the 400g filet. Was realy nice Really nice owner too.
We chose this place based on TA reviews and we're happy we did. The meat here is high quality at a great value. The service was very friendly and Johnny on the spot. I'd be happy to come back again.

Had dinner in this restaurant last night ....myself and my husband both had the fillet steak which was excellent ...nice house red (bit expensive for a house wine though)....friendly staff. Would definitely recommend eat here if you enjoy a good steak.
Had dinner here with my 9 work colleagues, Mario, our host, was most welcoming as was the other staff members, steak to die for and the wine fab!
Perfect steak and lovely atmosphere. Must pre book as this place gets busy. Staff go extra mile to ensure you are happy and give a personal feel.
A small, noisy place with uncomfortable chairs. Steaks were fine but everything else was pay as you go. Wine fine but overpriced. There are many better choices out there.
They were kind and serviceminded. Prices was reasonably and the streaks was good. We will come back.
Great place to eat, with a great atmosphere. Think I had the best stake I've ever had here. A must visit.
Good meat but very slow service and incredibly expensive drinks.1 coke 4,5 euros and a bottle of water 5 euros... I will avoid it the next time just fot this.
Had a lovely evening at La Luna with very helpful and friendly staff. The steak was amazing- perfectly cooked. This place is definitely worth a visit!

column3: sure I will go there again
column4: Food very good with lovely wines and friendly service. sure I will go there again. Usually I don't eat in very touristic restaurants of Amsterdam, but this one had good remarks and I thought lets go there with my tourist friends.

column3: Good meat in the heart of A'dam
column4: I had a huge and tasty steak. Although it's plenty of Argentinian restaurants, I followed the reviews and jumped into this one and I was more than satisfied by the meat which was really well cooked as I asked.
Excellent food, steak that melts in your mouth and super friendly staff! Food was to die for! Would come back again for sure!

column3: I'm tempted to give a bad review...
column4: ...Just to make sure it's a free table for me next time in Amsterdam. Been here three times, can't wait to get back. Great and friendly staff. Good atmosphere. And devine steaks.

We went Saturday night fantastic service by Mario and katcha ordered the rib-eye and was amazing cooked to perfection we both enjoyed very much,sides and drinks we're very nice!!!well worth the visit just hard to find but glad we did!!!thank you...
Wisited by recommendation of Trip advisor. The sirloin stake was perfect, the staff was vary friendly. Good place with fair prices.

column3: Don't Judge a book by its cover
column4: Visited here on the recommendation of trip advisor. It doesn't look much from the outside but the food is fantastic, great atmosphere and brilliant customer service. Definitely worth a visit for the steak

What excellent food And what lovely staff especially the owners The owners are a couple The lady is beautiful inside and out The gentleman so friendly Amazingly welcome people Marvellous atmosphere I would 100 percent Recommend it

column3: Muy bien. Very good service and delicious steak.
column4: Thanks for everything and your sweet stuff. You have to visit this place.Mumkunse iyi pismis et yemeyin turkler olarak :)

I live locally and this is one of the best steak and ribs restaurant in Amsterdam the staff are very helpful and friendly. The service is good and they tell you all about the food and wine. Great location and reasonable price

A lovely cosy restaurant in the hart of Amsterdam! The owner is passionate and gave us the royal treatment! Good wines and even better dishes. Real argentinian beef that tasted outstanding. Definitely going back.
this is a great place for a good hearty meal meal very well priced and nice atmosphere highly recommend.
It's a calm and nice restaurant where the staff makes sure you really feel welcome. The food was great and we didn't have to wait very long either. Recommended!

column3: Expensive not so good and above all not value for money.
column4: Firstly the food it self and specially the meat are not so high level and expensive. Secondly we've gotten an annoying waiter and very slow service . Nothing to write home about.

We had fillet and rib-eye steaks, both cooked to perfection..! Service was great also, I think it was the owner, really welcoming and smiling guy, making sure everyting was in order. Great experience!
Very very good steak. Do not hesitate, it's well worth it. Recommend the Argentinian (we had the four steak selection )
Service was spot on the food well it was delicious and really filling nice relaxed little place steak and ribs were the nicest
Delicious food, funny and kind staff, nice atmosphere, although there was a small order mistake, but it was solved nicely by the owner.
Good food and excellent service and value for money. The first courses were very tasty: vegetables soup that was perfect and chicken soup as well. The meat in the main course was made to perfection!

We managed to find a table even if we had not reserved. The restaurant is nice for the atmosphere. Food is good value for money(considered the prices in Amsterdam! ) and our steak was perfectly cooked. Would dine there again.

Dined here and enjoyed a great Argentinian fillet perfectly cooked with very nice grilled mushrooms. The guacamole is also very refreshing and light. Service is truly outstanding, everyone has been attentive and kind. Highly recommended!

Had a nice meal here, steak was good and the ribs also, staff were very friendly! Ordered Argentinian sausages which were nice but one sausage was a little rare! Overall a very pleasant meal in a nice atmosphere!
Great steak Restaurant and ideal for families. Good choice for smaller children including fresh chicken breast and beef burger. Steaks done to perfection!
Don't hesitate to visit this place. You will enjoy a tender piece of red meat, cooked to your liking. I asked it rare and it was indeed. Good choice.

My partner found this steakhouse and we weren't disappointed as it was amazing! I had the ribs and my partner a steak and both were fantastic. The restaurant is small and compact but service and food was great!
We have found this places and now I'm obsess is so good I love the meet and the wine and the service is great I Highly recommend this warm place with great steak and good wine

What a pleasure having dinner in this little gem of a restaurant. This place lets the food do the talking, no need for touts. We will be back for one of the best steaks I've had in a long time. Thanks La Luna :)
My 2nd visit to La Luna. Steak was just as beautiful as I remember it. Visiting here for a decent steak is a must when in Amsterdam.
We met a friend from Amsterdam at La Luna after a full day out sightseeing and the meal and service were top draw

Best steak I've had in a long time - and at a very affordable price! The host was almost overly friendly, but it brings such a charm to the place. I strongly recommend for a couple's dinner or other informal dinner plans!
The waiter was great! The restaurant is small but nicely laid out! The steak was out of this world and the prices reasonable! Definitely a good place to dine if in Amsterdam.
Very good burgers!! And also good wine. The staff was very nice and funny, a realy good place to eat good food and realx. It's very easy to find.
Top service. Top food. Top drinks. The manager Mario is a brilliant guy who went above and beyond to ensure we enjoyed our visit. If im ever in Amsterdam again i will go out of my way to visit here.
Very good food and very friendly staff - the friendliness was real. To recommend: The meatballs to start and the fillet for main dish.

Nice, small cozy place. Dinner and expecially meat was g8. Not that expensice, however one could find surley cheaper choices but I would totally recommend. Ps: A kind of funny...totally overfriendly old waitor might be there
The personnel is very kind and the food very delicious. It was a pleasure and we will come back when we come back to Amsterdam.
The steak was small, they charge you for everything (sauces etc..) and two big bottles of water costed 11 euros...

If you fancy a really good steak then this is where you should go. Cooked to perfection and just melts in your mouth. I would recommend that you book as the place is very tiny. The owner and staff are very friendly.
This restaurant doesn't look much from the outside but the food, atmosphere and the waiter (Mario?) we're so fantastic! Best meal me and my boyfriend have ever had. Would definitely recommend üòã
Went there one a Sunday afternoon and met by very friendly staff who helped us find the right choice of steak. And it tasted wonderful!

Came here because of the good reviews. The service is very friendly, knowledgeable and fluent. Waiting times were good, quality of the food was excellent. All in all, a great place to go if you're looking for tasty steak.
Amazingly attentive and pleasant waitress. Great steaks and nice surroundings. Overall good value. Would go again.

Just a nice words for this place! Steaks were delicious, one of my best I ever had, service pleasurable and proffessional. Mario, the waiter definitely went the extra mile to us and the others in the restaurant. Higly recommend!

We used the reservation tab on the Trip Advisor to make a booking. Even though we arrived 45 minutes late (due to getting lost!) we were greeted with the warmest of welcomes. Service, food and atmosphere were all impeccable. Would highly recommend this restaurant.

column3: Excellent steak house with great service. I definitely come back.
column4: Excellent steak house with great service. I definitely come back. Try their freshly prepared steak sauce with your steak and shrimp cocktail to start with.
Steak and side dishes were quite good. The host and atmosphere was great. Make sure you try the Argentinian sauce, it's amazing!
Would highly recommend. We we're greeted by Mario who made the occasion so much better. The food was excellent and served just at the right times. Very reasonable prices for the service and quality.
The smiles on the staff welcome you. The personal attention and service was superb. The dinner was served with in few minutes of ordering and the taste of the rib eye was excellent.
Most amazing steaks ever, fab atmosphere and service.....would definitely recommend.....fantastic value for money.....try the apple pie it's a must x
Unpretentious restaurant with adequate pricing in Amsterdam. It's steak tasted quite good! It has a good selection of wines.The shopkeeper is friendly.

column3: Pricey yet tasty and friendly host
column4: The Argentine steak house. Good taste. Fast service. The host is very friendly. But a bit pricey, I think

column3: Never had any steak like this before!
column4: I've been around the world, today's steak was truly the best I've had so far. The host was great as well. It will be my destination every time I visit Amsterdam.
Filet steak and french fries were perfect. Garlic break is just bread with garlic butter on the side. But the main issue is the service - It's wonderful!
Fantastic food the host was out of this world if you like your food and steak is one of your favourite this is the place to come. The stake was the best steak I have ever had. 5*****
Excellent service, delicious food, perfect portion sizes and the friendliest waiter Mario. Highly recommend a visit!

Great atmosphere! Meat superb! Price/quality is just fine. Mario, the owner from Argentina, was a great host even that he was super busy. Showed us also the meat in the fridge, he gets from Argentina directly.

Very small but cozy restaurant with a Real friendly hostess The steaks were really good and the wines were ok too but they need a Broader list Beside the small wine list it was really a good steakhouse Thomad
Staff were very friendly, lots to offer on menu. I had the sirloin steak which was delicious. Lovely setting, great for couples.

I had very high hopes after reading the reviews and seeing the certificate of excellence. However, after eating there i found that it was horrible. The steaks were less than ordinary and they were cooked more than requested.
Family of four staff attention to detail excellent. The owner very informative and passionate about his ingredients and wines. Really good food and venue.
Great food well priced and fantastic service, good place for a quick meal or somewhere to just chill for the evening outside seating area is a bit cosy but lots of space inside

Loved the food! Owner offered personal recommendations and explained the providence of their beef. Our waiter Martin was delightful. They even gave us a free argentine after dinner drink. Would recommend.
We came here during our weekend trip and wasn't disappointed! Great experience from beginning to end. Reasonably priced wine menu too. The house red complimented the meal perfectly
Very good food and lovely service i will visit again in next trip :) 19/07/2015 Thank you I will never forget this place !!
Steaks were excellent and service was fab. We eat early at 6.45pm so all staff had only us to please but the steak guy really knew his stuff and was so enthusiastic.
We had great time, Great food and great hospitality. The meet was perfect and the wine was very tasty. I will recommend it to my friends.
Good Argentinian barbecue and wine. The sauce was outstanding if You enjoy it spicy. Great hospitality and good service. Real value for money.
The food was delicious and the prices were reasonable. The service and location were fantastic. I definitely recommend this restaurant.
Really great service and a fantastic value for money. We went on the recommendation of these reviews and were not disappointed.

The beef was OK. Nothing special, but not bad either. The sides were sad. "Fresh, stir-fried vegetables". More like frozen, microwaved. Same with the onion rings. The grilled tomato was at least fresh, but it was barely warm and completely tasteless.
The service was amazing, the food even more amazing! The owner was fantastic with the kids. We don't normally go to the same place twice, but felt it was that good we had too!
Service second to none! The guy was so friendly and professional and attentive. Great food too with big servings. Great little place
I visited here with my friends. Staff were very kind and helpful. I like to visit here again!
An amazing place to eat. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. The food was all perfectly cooked as requested.
Ok, so it's in the midle of the worst tourist trap, but it's still worth a visit. Staff was friedly, and steaks good. I'll be back!
Small and cozy steak restaurant with the best steak I have ever tasted and the service was great also.

Food was delicious and service even better. Our reservation was for 8:15 and they didn't seat us until 8:16. No big deal obviously for us but the staff was extremely apologetic and gave us free wine! That's service.

We were very pleased with the service and the main ingredients, however, side dishes could be a more exciting. This said, if you are after a perfect steak, this is your place. Thank you for excellent service and hope to see you again Maestro.
Wonderful, so good we went twice on our trip to Amsterdam, lovely guy. Go there it's great!! Lovely experience
Lovely service, fantastic steak straight from Argentina. A bit overpriced side dishes, but otherwise a place worth visiting for steaklovers.

My friend and I found this place by chance and we're glad we did. Our waiter was very amiable and seemed to genuinely care if we were enjoying our food. The food tasted good and the servings was big. Truly value for one's money.
Top place if you love your meat.The host cant don't enough to help and make your whole dining experience an enjoyable one.Try the ribs in their special marinade and you won be dissapointed
It is a very nice place with a nice atmosphere. The steaks are delicious! For vegetarians the food is ok, but not as good as the meat or fish meals.

From the moment you walk in to the moment we got our coats the service was superb. The staff were friendly, considerate and helpful. Along with this great service, the food was excellent and consistent throughout. Great steak, great customer service and great experience
Great atmosphere, wonderful food and ambience. Four of us paid Euro 175 including everything we could eat, serious steaks and a few bottles of wine.
Visited at the weekend with a big group of friends, the staff we're very helpful and fast service considering how much food we all ordered! Would like to return again

Lovely little restaurant, great service, great food. The waiters did everything in their power to make our visit perfect. Steaks were really good, and even the fries were the best I've ever had. We are definitely coming back.

column3: Nice family run business, however a bit pricey
column4: Went for a steak here during my visit. It was family run and the service was amazing. However not very good value for money. I would definitely say far too expensive for the portion size and quality.
Excellent food and service. The beef is definitely from Argentina, so you know it is good! I recommend it if you are looking for a good quality restaurant with a fair price.
The fillet steak was one of the best I have ever had, shame all the side dishes cost extra. Manager/owner is a character but very friendly and attentative and makes you feel very welcome.
Have just dined at the restaurant, food superb, service excellent and an excellent host. Would not hesitate to recommend.

column3: The biggest steak I have ever seen!
column4: Lovely little restaurant, attentive staff and fantastic food. My husband and I both had the fillet steak, which was beautifully cooked and absolutely huge! Loved every mouthful - thank you!

column3: Grab a meal for the evening
column4: Looked for a good steak place as wanted a meal for the evening ...This place lives up to its reviews . Not to pricey ...good service and good food .....

Went on the Sunday before Xmas after reading the reviews. We were not dissappointed. Steaks were cooked to perfection (choice of three weights of steak). Sauces were fab as was the service and price. Would definitely visit again,
Steak was good, nothing special though. Chicken fillet was OK, ribs also. The service was great, which almost made it 4-star worthy. But since its still about the food: average...thats it!
Had the sirloin stake, which was very good. Special mention for the service, which was excellent, fun and personal.
FANTASTIC from walking in the door our waiter introduced himself and made use feel special, great menu and would highly recommend the garlic prawns, price is very reasonable great restaurant
The service was wonderful and the food was equally impressive. If you like Argentine beef, then look no further.

The environment was really warm from the first moment we got inside! The staff was very welcoming, the food was perfect! The dishes were large and really tasty! I strongly recommend the steak ribs! Finally the prices were reasonable for Amsterdam.

column3: The best food and service from a tiny restaurant.
column4: This restaurant is just fantastic! Athmosphere: excellent Service: excellent Food: excellent Need i say more?

Husband and I made sure we visited this restaurant based on previous reviews and it surely lived up to our expectations. Food was exceptional and steaks were cooked to perfection! Well worth the visit if you are in Amsterdam

column3: Excellent meal and a great host
column4: We had an excellent steak meal, good value for money. The host was amazing, charming, informative and really into making us feel great. Would recommend to anyone and I will definetely visit again when in Amsterdam.
