We ordered meat and they were so good. And staffs were so helpful also. You can trust them. Before you go you have to book
Seriously a quarter of a chicken for 22 euros is too much. It is just a steakhouse, nothing special like you can find hundreds around.
Found this steakhouse and thought the food was fantastic I would recommended the beef satay it was fabulous if you order the Ribs you won‚Äôt need a starter as its a big portion
Steak was perfect, nice atmosphere, good service! Also, snails in garlic were great! Hardly recommend this restaurant!

Been here this evening to try their ribs... and they are amazing!! All the staff are excellent and really helpful and the meals are very reasonably priced. You get a nice warm welcome and it has a nice atmosphere too. Definitely be back.
Great steak, and the bread with garlic butter was so good! Restaurant is in the centre so very easy to get to

I should start this off by saying I have been here more than a couple of times. I take all my visitors here! The quality of the food is unreal, service is relatively fast and the staff is friendly. Make sure to reserve your table!

column3: Best steakehouse in the centre of Amsterdam!
column4: This is one of the best steakehouse in Amsterdam. The quality of the meat is very good and everything on the menu is delicious!
Nice atmosphere. Great staff speaking excellent English. Good food. Great price. 1x ribs 1 X grilled Salmon 2 soft drinks 55 euros

column3: Truly one of the best steakhouses in Amsterdam
column4: Make a reservation and try out yourselves Recommendation: order your fillet steak rare Cooked to perfection you won‚Äôt find this anywhere else. At least I didn‚Äôt!
The food is very good and especially the pork fillet for me. the atmosphere is also very nice and friendly staff.
This place offers much more than very delicious food. It has great atmosphere and the service is very good too .
Met up with a couple of work buddies n headed over to try their ribs. All I can say is - WOW! It was great. I love ribs, and theirs score high in my charts!
I‚Äôve never had a steak this good. Medium absolutely on point!!! I got it with fries but to be honest, the steak is all you need. You wouldn‚Äôt need sides :-)
The location is very good, the service was very good, the food was excellent from starters to main course, the steak was exactly how I like it, I would definitely recommend it.
The place was recommended by the hotel, but what a disappointment. The order was medium, but the meat was rare. The very arrogant head waiter then gave us a hard time for not speaking up.
Absolutely amazing food. Highly recommended the fillet steak. Staff very courteous and professional, they made it a pleasant environment to dine in. Great location too.
Delicious ribs with bbq sauce. One portion with fries is enough for two women. We were totally full. Inside nothing special but totally recommend for a good grill food. 4,5 stars üòç
Super steaks and trust me half a rack of ribs we enough. Superb baked potatoes. Essspresso Martini to sink a ship great beer all said n done great.
We wanted to eat dinner there but the tables were dirty, Staff not very hospitable so we went somewhere else. Maybe the food is great, I cannot assess, but the place didn't make good impression.
Beautiful food. We both had steaks... Medium rare. Well cooked and presented. Nice central location.

column3: Another great night at this fabulous restaurant
column4: Third visit and once again it didn't disappoint. A lovely table for 4 in the window overlooking Rembrantplien. Good wine, beers and food. If you like steak this is the place to book.
Really good food one of the best jacket potatoes , and I can say it was the best meal during the trip.
The food is SO good. And the service is excellent! Sat outside and got there at 6 pm just before it started getting really busy. Must try the ribs!!
Back after four years and delicious as I remembered. Go and taste meat in this restaurant, it is a must to do!
Being there on a Friday eve, the place was crowded but quite comfortable, food was served within a reasonable time and was delicious. Recommended!
Visited here whilst in Amsterdam for dinner. Sat at the bar and enjoyed good wine and food. Crab cocktail starter was especially nice. Friendly staff and I‚Äôd visit again.

I came here with my partner and another couple the food was delicious and the staff were friendly and efficient. If you want a great steak or fall of the bone ribs I would highly recommend you eat here.
Very good steakhouse located just next to Rembrandt place. We had a nice all well cooked Dutch Angus Entrecote. Very nice staff.
I was here with some friends and had an amazing night. Good food and very friendly employees. I am definitely coming back!!
Really good food and even if it was busy the service was still on point and very friendly. Highly recommended!

We have been there for dinner. Great selection of food and excellent taste. It was so good that we also went there a second and a third time during our one week stay in Amsterdam. The service is excellent as well. Thanks Tosca Sombroek!
Its my 5 or 6 visit in l The last 5 years. Good as always. I had a fillet. Superb meat. They know how to treat it. Recomended!
My friend and I came here for a steak, and although the food was nice, the service was incredibly slow. I would come again- but I‚Äôd like to see the speed and quality of their service improve.
Staff on the outside on 03rd of June are very ignorant and not helpful and have a huge attitude problem. It's shame. Do not recommended
The quality of the food and specially of the meat and fish are excellent. The waitresses are very cordial and make suggestions if asked to do so.
Half of the steaks ordered were excellent (around the well done point) - The other half very undercooked. Moderate service on a busy nice, nice patio atmosphere.
I enjoyed very courteous and professional service, and a selection of lamb chops with wonderful sauce that made my night a great experience. I can only recommend De Nachtwacht.
A good place for night out with friends. Good wine, great menu variety. Food is remarkable though it takes a while to reach the table but you know it is fresh!
Spend ages looking around for somewhere good to eat lastnight when we stumbled on this gem! The food is amazing and the staff are extremely friendly! Highly highly recommend!
Booked online in Amsterdam very easily and it was confirmed by email. Food, service and atmosphere all great. Very busy place and very lovely staff.
Great atmosphere. Not cheap but a memorable experience on Rembrandt Square. Good 70s music. Try the Affigem blonde beer.

Ordered the entrec√¥te which was way more chewy then supposed to be at 25‚Ç¨. Exchanged for a fillet which they overcooked. Fries tasted a bit off, didn‚Äôt like any of the sauces. Due to cold weather also cold inside. Cannot recommend.

Everytime that i go to Amsterdam i need to have a dinner here, excellent service, excellent ducth meat coock perfectly. Surf and turf plate is one of my favourite. Dutch black angus absolutely to try. The position is also another plus of this place, Rembrantplein.
A lovely meal in a lovely atmosphere for my mum's 60th birthday. We all had steak which was beautiful.
Very good meal we had at this place. Professional service and a warm environment. Good value for the money!
Amazing food, ribs were very good!! So much food, it is worth the money! Friendly staff & good location. Would visit again if I‚Äôm ever back in Amsterdam.
Great food at a beautiful and comfortable restaurant, resonable price and great service. Defenetly recomend this place!

column3: Ribs steak beer wine and atmosphere
column4: Great ribs, thick fries tasty steaks and a glass of beer or wine and your done. If you‚Äôre around just reserve a table and stop by.

As good as it gets, i‚Äôd say. The only con is the portion - it‚Äôs huge. We learned the trick some time ago, so now we order the half portion. The ribs are really the best I‚Äôve eaten. I‚Äôll be back!!!
We have reservation for table and waiting our table two hours and go out becouse didn‚Äôt get!:((( The staff was no frendly.
Wife and I were in for a quick and small meal. We were promptly expedited and ordered escargout and onion soup as both were good.

column3: Delicious steak! Treat for us American travelers on Thanksgiving day!
column4: Enjoyed delicious steaks and cocktails in place of traditional American turkey feast. This place did not disappoint! Friendly wait staff and meals cooked to perfection! In a quaint plaza, enjoy it!!!
First time visit. Friendly and helpful staff and amazing steaks. Highly recommended a visit. Definitely will return.
Very good Steak house in Amsterdam. The lamb is delicious, Baked potato too. Medium price. I recommend it !
Chosen because of online reviews. Did not disappoint. The filet was cooked to perfection. Recommend you make reservations at this very busy restaurant.
Stopped here for evening meal. Nice looking bar but food was very average and very costly (70Euro for 2 mains and two beers!). Steak was a bit tough and not cooked to medium more well done.

I never miss an opportunity to eat in this steakhouse. The babyback ribs are so tender that the meat just falls off the bone. The only con i can think of is that the portion is far too big for a single person. Consider sharing.
Excellent food, service and location. Cannot fault there fillet steak, taste texture and just quality was spot on. A hint of herbs of some sort on the meat from cooking was an unexpected treat.
- very good food, steaks - nice lively atmosphere - nice music - friendly staff - nice view on the square
I really liked this place. Good food (and big portions) The staff was friendly and helpful : ) I can recommend it
Fantastic food, the best steak !!!!! However slow service & waitress forgot a few items & I had to repeat a few things we wanted. Great steak , just be prepared to wait !

Right on Rembrandt square so location and atmospere was ideal for people watching and enjoying the square and the amazing weather. Service was good and the steak I ordered was cooked perfectly, was tender, and super flavorful.

Visited this place twice because the food was amazing! We had Tbone steak and ribs, both of them made us visit again at the end of stay. Maybe waitress lady should put a better smile on her face :) Thanks!
We ordered lamb that had a strong taste of goat and satte which was practicly rare inside. Wouldn't recommend at all

column3: One of the beat steaks i've eaten!
column4: Fantastic restaurant. Great service. Dutch Ribeye was amazing and wife's Fillet even better. Highly recommended!

Very popular yet able to accommodate walk ins. The Dutch Mussels were amazing - great bit of spice to them. The fillet steak is well worth the price - succulent and cooked as ordered. Decent wine menu and good coffee!
Fillet steak was so amazing I bought two in a row...one for dinner, one for dessert. Cooked well, no fat... And great location for people watching.
Reasonably priced restaurant on the busy Rembrandtplein. Good steak with enough fries to share. French onion soup starter was excellent.
The steak was perfect, the fries perfect and the waiters are cute. Me and my boyfriend really enjoyed! Would defenatly recommend! üòª
We dined here on a lazy Saturday afternoon and really enjoyed my lunch . I had mixed grill and my wife had ribs a nd everything was cooked to perfection. I would highly recommended
Staff were incredible, food was amazing, and the view of the square just brought it all together. Although it's a bit on the pricey side it was definitely worth it!
Meat was great, staff was friendly, dessert was perfect. Vanilla ice cream with chocolate sauce, it is a must, if you come here.
Nice service and very good steak. We stayed outside with some people. Service was quick, employees frienfly and great food. I tried the fillet steak which was very good. I recommend this steakhouse.
Waited for 1.30 with a baby for old meat to be served. A serving girl brought coffee in a broken glass and just spilt it to another glass (didn't make new).
Nice place to have meal. Better to make a reservation in advance. Otherwise you can only choose outdoor seats (and the heater is not really working...)
Love this place. Get the ribs. Great ambiance. Good beer . Friendly staff. My wife got steak and she loved it.
Best ribs I've ever had , always visit here when I'm at the Dam . The mixed grill is excellent to , cannot recommend this place high enough
Amaizing staff, the food was superb,the mest just melted in my mouth, couldn't ask for more. Just go there and have the finner of your life.
The lobster soup with cognac is just a piece of art and a festival for the mouth. Ideal to recovery from cold weather.
Excellent food in all dishes that they have prices are reasonable. Recommended .this is the third visit .
Worth every penny! Excellent food, nice atmosphere, very friendly staff. Would recommend for everyone. A must when in Amsterdam!

column3: Fantastic venue, great food and service
column4: Booked from uk online Attended Everything ready, table service and venue great Good views for people watching from downstairs area by front Super fast service Fantastic food Great staff Can't fault it Thank you we will return
We hadn't made a reservation (probably should have) but they squeezed us in. Desipte a low table in the draft from the door I would still go back again and again. Really nice steak and great chips.

Did the 18mile North Amsterdam bicycle trip - decided that steak was in order afterwards - was relatively early but could only get a table at the bar. Great service, great food - best dining of the Easter Weekend - went home very happy.

Stumbled upon this place, and without reservation they found us a table. Nice place with good atmosphere inside. Steak was really nice but the ribs were unbelievably good! Superlatives do not do them justice.

column3: lovely place, amiable service, excellent food
column4: Loved this place. Friendly service, excellent quality for a reasonable price, and we enjoyed the view and athmosphere in the city. Both typical and friendly, while unpretentious and relax
I had a ribs which were excellent, my freind had the chops and she said they were really nice as well. The price is reasonable.
One of the best dinners at Amsterdam. Great steaks. Nice athmosphere. I would recommend warmly. Friendly service.

column3: Amazing!Amazing! Generous portions, delicious meat! Best meal ever had!!
column4: Amazing! Generous portions, delicious meat! Best meal ever had!! The starters were so good! The muscles and the beef sate to die for!
Food is amazing, really worth every penny. Staff are all really friendly, the guy behind the bar is very helpful. Highly recommend. Worth every penny!
I had fillet steak and the quality was amazing! great chips too! overall a lovely restaurant and reasonable prices!
Super nice place for drinks in Amsterdam. We didn't try the food so i can say anything about that. But service was good!
Lovely staff, best steaks we‚Äôve had in years. Nice relatively busy bar restaurant atmosphere overlooking Rembradt Plien. Would recommend to anyone.

The food was delicious. Best ribs i've ever had and im still thinking about them! My wifes steak was cooked perfectly. Beers were great and the atmosphere was really cool. Staff were friendly and great to deal with. Thanks!
Best Steakhouse, Remprandtplein, Amsterdam. Excellent service and place. Call for Reservation before visit, usually all table booked.
We both enjoyed dinner and had great window seats. Staff was super friendly and attentive. Highly recommend making reservations.

column3: The best meat in Amsterdam in a beautiful square
column4: Elegant, romantic, comfortable, welcoming and warm Bbq&steak restaurant. You will remain striked by the incredible tast of meat dishes. It's not even so expensive for serving meat afterall. You can eat a 300g steak with big fried chicken and a medium bier with 30 euro
was there this week and was not disappointed,great food at a good price staff were very friendly good atmosphere
We stopped at the Nachtwacht for a late evening drink. The atmosphere was great and the staff were cool. We only had drinks but it was really enjoyable. Would return to this place.
Stumbled upon this by chance and very glad we did. It's pretty much steak and ribs but great quality and a nice ambient atmosphere. Would return if we were in Amsterdam again
Had the best steak that I can ever remember having. Melt in your mouth tender, full of flavour and cooked to perfection.
Very nice service, atmosphere and food. The later however was far from excellent. Had a fillet steake which was burned too much on the outside and less in.
Really good place for dinner with tasty food, good beer and friendly staff. Always crowded (for consideration). Strictly Recommending!
The patio is where it's at on a nice summer day in Amsterdam. Excellent setting, food, beer, and scenery make this an absolute winner in my book. Try the ribs, they're fantastic!!

Walked in there for a late night drink, and i was pleasantly surprised by their quality of service as well as bar keeping. I only tried the fries which tasted nice, but could see that ppl. seems to be really satisfied with their food.
Had the mixed grill and the T bone. Meat was amazing. Would highly recommend this place. Jacket cane with garlic mayo.
Loved this restaurant, cosy, warm and with a lovely atmosphere. Staff friendly and very helpful, and the food was amazing. Would definitely use again.
Great location at Rembrandtplein, fast and helpful service. Large and tasty meals. Great assortment of beers.
Lovely warm environment. Nicely decorated; staff are very nice; Food was fantastic; and a amazing location..
Good food.. Just the right portion n taste... Friendly n smiley service... Worth it.. Its recommended

column3: Good steakhouse - and one of the few open late
column4: Working late for a tradeshow, we found ourselves looking for dinner. Places in Amsterdam stay open until two, but stop serving food at 10. This place had a very decent grilled Filet and excellent fries. Good place to know about, in a fun location.
It was a great choice ! The steaks were very delicious and appetising. We enjoyed the food and the view to the square

Meat in this place is absolutely good. There is a lot of confusion but this is tipical of Amsterdam, best places are tipically crowded at any time. If you love steak, you need to try this restaurant. Not cheap, but worth it.
Food was really good, everything seemed very freshly prepared. Excellent atmosphere, really enjoyed the outdoor eating area.
I eat here every time I go to Amsterdam and have never had a bad meal here. The steak was amazing, deserts were great too.Well worth a visit if you are there. Staff were friendly and efficient.

Recommended and was not disappointed. Very pricey but worth it. Recommend the ribs and steaks. One of the best steaks I've had. Drinks very expensive, the alcohol bill was more than food bill! But again worth it! Will definitely re visit

column3: Just across street from De Nachtwacht aka Night Watch statues in the SQ.
column4: Really great location to hang out and view the square with all the Night Watch figures in real life size configurations based on many of the works of the Masters you have seen in the museums.
We went as we saw the ribs on a plate as we walked by, we were not disappointed. They were the best ribs we have had in a long time, don't walk by give them a go. Staff were also very friendly

column3: Still doing what they do best
column4: Excellent value Great food cooked to perfection Friendly service ...what more could you want? I'd always recommend this place in the square

I was there to celebrate my parents anniversary. The restaurant really made an effort, they arranged a dessert for our family and playing a track "celebrations" which was very fun. The food was very good also. I highly recommend this place :-)
Amazing place and great food and what makes this place special is the real friendly professional staff! It's a must visit restaurant

We visited this restaurant for lunch, based upon the comments found at TripAdvisor. We were lucky to find a table immediately; next visitors had to wait! The quality and the taste of our meal (beef or chicken) was excellent! Worth a visit.

Had a delicious dinner here on our last evening over looking Rembrandt square. The food was fantastic and the staff were so nice. I got a steak and my boyfriend had ribs which were lovely. Alot of food and a reasonable price. Definitely would recommend.
Stumbled upon this and tried it after reading reviews. Incredible ribs and the salmon was good. Reasonably priced. I'd recommend this to anyone who loves ribs.

Having found this restaurant with tripadvisor we were looking forward to a good steak, and that we got. Plenty and wellprepared food. Only reason for NOT giving 5 stars was the worn-down look of the place, because everything else was fine.

This restaurant off Rembrandt Plein was crowded which seemed to impact the usually stellar service we found in comparable eateries in Amsterdam. The food was good, with both steaks and salmon done to perfection. There is a large outdoor seating area which was pleasant.

The food was quite good, high quality, good quantity, a bit pricey. But the greatest disappointment was the staff, my friend and I were constantly ignored when trying to order, ask a question, or even request the bill. will not be returning
I visit Amsterdam twice a year and I always visit De Nachtwatch. The best marinated spare ribs!!!! the place is always very busy and is better to book a table in advance especially in Summer.
Title says it all, stumbled across this little restaurant and was truly delighted with the spectacular meal. Ribs were the best I have EVER tasted. Along with the satay skewers.
a really good place , the food was super good and a nice service not the lowest price a place that can be clearly recommended
Previously visited June 2015 and made a point of returning. Comfortable setting with good service and the ribeye didn't disappoint!! Very good.

This restaurant was recommended to us by the staff of the hotel where I was staying (their restaurant was closed for the evening). The staff were friendly, the steaks were excellent and the wine was good too, although the choice of wine was somewhat limited.

We were told that in Amsterdam you would get good food and bad service, but generally we were well looked after. The exception was the Nachtwacht, but the service wasn't so bad as to ruin the meal and the food itself was very good.

Great dinner spot! Also in a great location. Definitely would recommend making a reservation if going for dinner. Had the spare ribs and they were to die for! Meat was very tender, fell right off the bone. Would definitely go back again!

column3: Very Good Ribs in Lovely Location
column4: My wife and I are ribs fans so we have tried 3 places so far since moving here in February. De Nachtwacht is the best so far and very tasty flavour. Also handy for M&S and in Waterloopliein which has nice bars with outside tables.
The ribs, mixed grill, side dishes, and the Steaks all great, if you can get a table outside, even better. Very good position on Rembrantplatz
Nice atmosphere. Good quality food A good value for money. Salad was a beat tired but meat (I had a fillet of beef about 26‚Ç¨) was superb.

Had a Parma-ham and melon starter which was surprisingly good. Nice serving with a small salat. Had the US Black Angus Steak. The meat was slightly overcooked but it still remained a fair steak. The service was slow and the waiters seemed unfocused.
The ribs are amazing and a huge portion! One order fed us both. Don't waste your money on sides! Unless it's the baked potato!
Went there again after many dinners in the Nachtwacht. Same quality of ribs and meat. Good service, pleasant atmosphere. Will eat there again for sure.

Great atmosphere and the food was incredible. I had a mixed grill and my girlfriend had a fillet steak and we both really enjoyed it. You'd struggle to find better food in my opinion. Our only regret is not going back the next night!

This is the best restaurant in Amsterdam. The ambience is good, the food plentiful and delicious, and the value excellent. I recommend the chicken drumsticks and the lamb chops. Will definitely return

We went there for BBQ, as its reputation suggested, We had a nice starter, then the ribs. Boiled and grilled with way to much rub applied at the end, not before grilling, and a over heavy sauce. Not good!

column3: Nice place for some of the best ribs in town
column4: In the middle of the bustling and crowded Rembrandtplein area this is one of the best places in town for a steak or ribs.
My wife and I have been visiting Amsterdam once every couple of years or so for 20 years. We always have a dinner at the Nachtwacht and have never been disappointed by our meal or the service.
Dropped in without a reservation and lucky to get a table. Delicious dinner. Lamb was amazing. Beef sat√© delicious. Just a lovely evening. Make a reservation!!! It was packed when we left
Great place... Went in very late... They were very accommodating and we had the best meal in months. Beef satay and rack of ribs..... WOW!!! Going back tomorrow!

Visited this restaurant with friends for dinner. Order the mixed grill dish, which was very delicious. The dish was accompanied by a selection of sauces. I would recommend this place for having steak or other grilled meat in a nice atmosphere.
My partner and I came here over valentines weekend. Not only was the food delicious, the service and ambiance was exceptional. I would highly recommend to anyone in the area

Me & my girlfriend had a lovely steak meal in here washed down with a few Heinekens (we had done the Heineken Experiance earlier). Great place to eat if you visit Rembrandtplein. Great staff, good prices & good atmosphere.

At corner of Rembrandtplein (where our hotel was). Excellent steaks beautifully presented come in several sizes (as is common in Amsterdam). Reservations advised. Small and tables very close to each other but not a problem except for relative privacy.

I sat at the bar where the service and food recommendations were welcomed. I just wanted some wine and food... a mix of filet steak and ribs were suggested so that I could the best of both worlds. Will go back one day...
Cracking meal, great service and great food! Recommend the ribs, although a lot of food to get through! Good location and very good value for money!
Great dinner, with quick service, nice wine and food pairing suggested by the waiter before photo-session with Rembrandt " The Night watch" bronze sculptures.
We came for Amsterdam for a 3 night stay and ended up eating from here twice out of those nights! Absolutely gorgeous food, would recommend.

Our first night in Amsterdam we had dinner here and was very impressed food was amazing!! Cooked to perfection the meat was fresh and condiments were also good. Lovely staff and a very nice place itself. Would defiantly recommend it
Baked Potato with Steak, Cooked to perfection. Looking forward to returning one day. I would highly recommend, Better than space cakes.

This restaurant was recommended to us by a Dutch friend staying in AMS and it is truly one of the best steakhouses I have ever eaten!! Nice indoor atmosphere, friendly staff, very tender meat and beer selection from local small breweries!!
Great restaurant. Service was very attentive and professional. Food was exceptionally good. Would definitely recommend and wont hesitate to go back.
Most amazing ribs ive ever had! Food, wine, armosphere was all amazing and really reasonably priced!! Loved it!

This is my favourite Rib restaurant in Amsterdam. The ribs are delicious and plentiful. I really like the Escargot appetiser as well. The restaurant has indoor and outdoor seating and always seems busy. If you like ribs it's a must !!!
Nice restaurant with great staff. The food was really good and it was big portions, too big for my taste. I want to be able to eat 3 courses.
Very busy place on Rembrandt Square specialising in steaks. The food was great but a tad expensive, but you get what you pay for. Open very late for food.
What a wonderful restaurant, really helpful waiting staff and the best steak I have ever had, a restaurant not to be passed by!
Food and service are of good quality.The meat and the snails are cooked superior.Excellent food and beers,etc.
A good beer and some Spareribs is always a good combination. De Nachtwacht did indeed deliver this. The service was great and very helpful.
My partner had the steak and I had the pork, both were delicious. Staff are really friendly and helpful too.
This restaurant has a very good location next to Rembrandt Square with a nice view. Food is good, prices are ok. Service is slow.

column3: Good steak good service reasonable price
column4: Good steak, prompt service, reasonable prices. Probably the best of the many restaurants in the Rembrantsplein. If you get a table at the window you'll be able to see the Nachtwacht sculptures as you eat.
Great location and excellent food, the streaks and potatoes here are great. The service is friendly and relaxed and the location is excellent. Recommended as a place to start your night in Amsterdam.
Nice atmosphere, friendly staff. Good drinks but no Margaritas! Food is ok, but average.We were told the meat was superb, but it was not. Overall it's a fun place.
We had some really good steaks her and great wines But the service was really slow and they did not know who ordered what Improve and it could be a 5 Thomas
Restaurant was very busy on a Saturday night and I would recommend booking beforehand as we did. However, the service was good as was the steak. The chips were very nice too.
nice atmosphere , good music , good food and friendly staff! Best ribs in town! We will definitely eat here again on our next trip to Amsterdam

Great location in Rembrandt square. Had the onion soup to start and the rib eye. I ordered it medium rare and it came out a little too purple. They popped it back on grill for a sec and it was perfect. Will come back
Not good by Italian standards: a mixed grill consisted of just a spit and a lamb chop very small ... not even the sode dish. Tot ‚Ç¨ 22.75 + ‚Ç¨ 3.50 + beverage... Non √® adatto per noi italiani...

Had a great dinner at the restaurant. For starters take the lobster soup! It was amazing... For the main course we all had fillet steaks. They were all cooked perfectly and the pepper sauce was tasty! Thanks for a great visit!

We really enjoyed our visit to De Nachtwacht were we celebrated my husbands 40th birthday. Great atmosphere and relaxed vibe, would highly recommend. This was recommended by our hotel and they did not disappoint.
enormous steak, the second time I settled for a 'lady steak', 200g instead of 300g. On the corner of Rembrandtplein.

This will be the last time I listen to a Cosiegere. Average pricy food with a bar like atmosphere and the most unfreindly waitress in Amsterdam. Total waste of the night. Steak was as tough as John Gotti.
Location is cute! Staff is kind and lovely. Steak is absolutely delicious and I love chicken wings! I raccomend you hardly... ;)

column3: Good food in a nice place
column4: It was busy so I eat at the bar. Nice helpful staff and good food. I had some local Dutch dishes, but is it more an international food theme that is on the menu.
Had dinner here on the last night and we both went for the ribs! They were so tasty! Highly recommend!
A lovely meal. Staff were very friendly, the beef satay was delicious and my steak perfectly cooked. Would definitely eat here again.

column3: Surprised how good my steak was
column4: Since this was right in Rembrantplein, a very popular tourist spot, I wasn't expecting too much, but very pleasantly surprised by how good this steak was. If you are ever in Amsterdam, its a safe bet and a great location. Very reasonably priced as well.
Came on Saturday 21st and food was great (steak and mixed grill and prawns pil pil) house red wine delicious and service from waitress' and bar man very friendly
Nice and big portions combined with a friendly staff. Worth to go. Nice ribs and with fries, combined with garlic butter and bread. Nice Sunday lunch.

column3: Best ribs we ever had - bad service tho.
column4: Marinated spare ribs, no questions needed. Waitress can be a little difficult with attitude and questionable service-mind. But all is good when the food arrives, marvelous spare ribs.
The plates are huge. You get a LOT of food. Meat is wonderful. Ok prices. Service is ok, but we needed to wait a long time for them to come. So our visit took ages. Their coffee is lovely.

I took a medium steak and it was excellent. Ambient is really nice and the location close to vibrant Rembrandtplein is a plus. Price was fair and affordable. Next time when I'm in Amsterdam I'm definitely visiting this place again.
Open until late. It s a steakhouse. They mainly serve meat and potatoes, but also have option with fish.good quality quite big portions, nice ambience. A bit pricey but it s worth!
My husband and I discovered this by walking around the Rembrandtplein. He loved their ribs! The food is large portions and the meats are cooked to perfection. Reasonably priced wine and food.
Mainly full of their own importance and felt we should not be present as only bought some drinks. Aware you're waiting but still potter about with as reported the glare.. Service was pathetic!
Excellent meal friendly staff A* lobster soup and mussels gorgeous then steaks and ribs with nice bottle of wine. Great atmosphere with xmas market through the window

The meat was cooked perfectly. A friend of mine had the pork loin and that was just as awesome. Presentation was great. Coffee service after was awesome. Very well done restaurant with attentive service.
great atmosphere, great steak, very attentive staff good place to be and see what is going on in Rembrandt square
Planned to have an early dinner here, but so many good appetizers to choose from that we settled for drinks and appetizers. Just enjoyed sitting and watching the square come to life in the evening.

We were looking for a nice place to eat while in Amsterdam. Our hotel recommended this specific place - and it was an excellent dinner with excellent server. It most certainly warrants a return visit!

Spent the evening eating tapas and spare ribs at this restaurant. We were treated to free shots and free dessert. Thanks very much to the staff and Mario for looking after us, we had lots of fun!

We had this restaurant on our bucket-list for a long time. If you like steak/grill, this is the place to go. They have a nice terrace besides the canal and the service is very fast and super friendly. Enjoy!
The steak is great. Juicy and fresh. The prices are a bit steep but understandable since it's on the city center. The view towards the Amsterdam canal is good for chilling.
Amazing place to eat, lovely food, friendly staff, nice location. Would highly recommend eating here. Shame we only food it on the last night otherwise would of eaten here the whole week üòã
There are many steak resaurants in Amsterdam, however, this is the best. Service is very good, and prices are comfortable. a meal costs Euro 10:15

Visited this resturant last time in amsterdam. The staff were friendly and helpful. The food was really good and the prices were not that bad to be quite honest. I'm visiting again soon and look forward to returning to the resturant
Very tender juicy meat, nice salad and fries on the side. Staff was really friendly, red house wine defenetly recommender
Excellent food!!!!!You really feel you are in south america the chef is great. We went 2 times and always same treatment.
There are many o these restaurants, but this one is a good one, great service, great food and would go again
We had the specials - chicken, steak, ribs. It was delicious!!! The staff were superb and it's in the centre of all that happens ;)
The food we had was only average one rare steak we ordered came out raw my medium was rare the soup was very ordinary the waitress we had was very good it's located in the red light district

column3: nice argentinian restaurant in quiet sidestreet
column4: delicious food and big portionsy we had the vegetarian plate and really enjoyed it. very nice staff, cosy atmosphere with great music. can totally recommend this place!!
First of all the atmosphere of this place is dynamite wonderful outstanding can't say enough. Staff are very friendly. The food was average at best this night but I would give it another try!

column3: Very good food and great service
column4: A very good place to eat if you want a restaurant with a calm and friendly atmosphere. Fantastic food (especially the steaks) and great service. I will definitely come back the next time I'm in Amsterdam.
We sat outside on the canal which made for a great eating environment. Filet & Ribeye cooked to perfection. Attentive service, a little expensive but the portions are generous!
amazing restaurant with the most delicious food I ever tasted. Great location and view from the terrace. The service is well organized and neat.
Delicious food, beautifull restaurant, lovelly staff! Without any doubt a place to repeat one day if we return to Amsterdam!
Surprisingly good restaurant. And very nice and beautiful latvian waitresses. And a very nice and handsome owner. It was a really nice evening 'cause of them. :) Nora un Alvis
Located near Red Light District around one of the many canals. Place is cozy and the owner (Egyptian) is extremely hospitable. Prices are fair and the wine selection is well thought of.
Meat was excellent. Well cooked. Very good service. I enjoyed being there with my friends. Kindest people. I would go again and strongly advice.

The food was overpriced, not a very comprehensive menu. The food was flavourless and dry and overcooked with pushy staff and there are just much better places near by, save your money and keep on looking.
Quite good- meat very tasty and tender. Good choices. Excellent service- a bit expensive but overall good
Very good meat, nice seating and atmosphere accompanied by live music on this rainy Friday eve. Was a perfect little escapism in this rather peculiar period. Highly recommended!üëåüèº
Relaxed atmosphere and friendly welcome - if you're in the mood for an honest no nonsense steak and nice glass of wine this is a good choice. Great food and service - can highly recommend.
Perfect steaks. Lovely atmosphere. Friendly service. Couldn‚Äôt recommend it more! (We had the tuna steak mid-rare and the flank mid-rare)
Very good food and service, the location is excellent next to the shopping area Careful the burger is spicy for kids try it with no spicy saouce
The food was really nice, the service was mediocre and the price was extraordinary. Good for larger groups with a big budget! Not much in the way of atmosphere.
Great smoked brisket sandwich and good beer selection. Large portions with fresh hot chips and nice atmosphere.

Very delicious meals , everyone was happy with thier food. We went for dinner after the Amsterdam marathon, we were a group of 6. The beef patty in my burger was of a great quality and I can go back anytime.
My second time there! Delicious meat... good selection of wines and friendly staff! 100% recommended!!

We visited here yesterday and they managed to fit us in without a booking. The wine and steak was delicious and I would highly recommend to anyone going. They did forget our bread starter but except for this we had a lovely dinner out.

Nice a cozy place with excellent service, food was perfectly cooked, meat on the point!, they really nailed the cooking process. I am a foodie, with an extensive experience, I have my Instagram page (flavored) and when I visited The Uptown MeatClub I was delighted!
Amazing food! Great place! Very clean and organised. The location is also good! The atmosphere is matching the Amsterdam environment.

From the minute we arrived we loved this restaurant! The staff are so friendly and the food is fantastic! Best steakhouse in Amsterdam I‚Äôd say! Very good varied menu with lots of choice! Couldn‚Äôt fault one thing! 5 star!
Marriott recommended this restaurant and we fully enjoyed! The service was great. The sides were large enough to share. The restaurant was cozy and very clean.

column3: Found a spot for us on a busy night
column4: Staff was absolutely wonderful and found a spot for us on a busy night. The service was so attentive and helpful The food was so good we asked to meet the chef to say thanks!
A busy Restaurant on Kings Day. I had a tasty Angusburger and my wife had the ladies tenderloin which was excellent.
We enjoyed the ambiance, we ate late, the service was very good and our steak dinner was delicious. It was very close to our hotel so we had only a short walk, we stayed at the JLNo76
We took our 6 year old and 8 year old for a late dinner after a long day travelling the streets of Amsterdam. The food was excellent and there were several great choices for children too.
After passing this place a few times, took a chance and stopped for dinner. I had the steak and my companion had a burger. Fantastic food, exceptional service.

Really great food, wine & service. Had the tuna steak - best ever. Really good wine, spent all evening there, no problem, no hassle from the staff. Would definitely return. Great atmosphere, furnishings, lighting
3 of us met here for dinner and all enjoyed it very much. Busy, friendly service and reasonably priced as the food was excellent. I can recommend the burger, the steak salad and the Tuna.
We had meat and cheese platter for starter shared between 2 of us. For mains we had steak. The food was cooked perfectly. My partner is Gluten Free and they worked the dinner around that fine.
Chilled relaxed venue lovely service not forced. Chilled music with lovely selection. Steaks well cooked definate thumbs uü§ó
The food was boring and tasteless. I also got food poisoning from this place. Do NOT visit. Choose another place.
This is a cool ‚Äúlocal‚Äôs‚Äù restaurant for lunch or dinner. Eclectic and flexible menu, attentive staffing, friendly, youthful ambience, modern decor. Moderate pricing.

The burgers looked great but we opted for salads and they were very nicely presented and the fries are really tasty. Slightly overshadowed by the Seafood restaurant next door, but actually this is just as good.
We had an excellent lunch today. Burgers where excellent. Service good. Enjoyed our visit. Thank you
Was there around 3pm on a weekday afternoon. Restaurant had only 4-5 tables full but I waited more than 30 minutes for my meal. The steak was delicious though.

Best dinner we had in Amsterdam. My husband ordered a mixed grill that he said was excellent. Service was good despite a huge bachelorette party. Server could have been a little more clear about ordering sides. Food was excellent

Good choice of salads, meat dishes, burgers and desserts. Not properly cheap but it is located in one of the most important shopping area in Amsterdam. The Caesar salad was very good while the broccoli soup not fantastic really. The environment inside is very nice.
Even if this place would have 0 service, I would comeback here. Those sandwiches were the best in my life. Highly recommend them
We went for dinner. The meat was perfect, the wine too. The service is not so good. Probably this is why the place wasn‚Äôt full.
Lovely, food and wine, good service chilled, relaxed atmosphere, good music, what more can you ask, oh good value for money as well

I can highly recommend this restaurant, we went on a Sunday afternoon for a light lunch (soup) which was perfect. They have a great selection of food and wine. And as a bonus they had live jazz music.
The interior is well designed. Food is delicious and the service is great. If only we were served a bit sooner, I would have given a 5 star review.

Shared a couple of starters (the Spanish one and another) then large steak (rare and it was melt in the mouth lovely. Nice tracks playing on the sound system. Their pale ale is lovely too. Very enjoyable.
Brilliant relaxed atmosphere. Good food, lovely wine and great service. Location ideal for hotels in museum area

column3: A Great Find in a Big City!
column4: We had pasta, burgers and ribs and every meal was outstanding. The atmosphere was brilliant and everyone was incredibly friendly. Definitely visiting again.
Popped in here for a quick bite. The service was good, but the food was pretty average. The pea mint soup lacked flavor, but the steak sandwich was nice.

We ordered medium steaks and send them twice back. It was bloody instead of medium. They burned it afterwards but it was still bloody inside. What a amateur restaurant. Go to get a Burger somewhere else instead of eating here.

The restaurant is cozy The staff is very friendly and service minded We were 5 people and the others had a steak to their wishes My steak was undercooked not once but twice and firma steak House i find that concerning Thomas
All the staff are very attentive, pleasant, enthusiastic, all speak really good English. The atmosphere was relaxed and the food was excellent....try the ribs!!
Went here for dinner prior to visiting the Van Gogh museum. Found food decent and prices seemed reasonable.

column3: Ate there twice because it was so good
column4: Our family of five enjoyed up town meat club. On both of our visits the food and service was especially good. We were very happy with the selections that were available. Service was quick and the food delicious.

column3: Lovely tender steak - full of flavour
column4: This restaurant is really about delicious steak in a great environment with excellent service. I was given a steak knife but I could have cut the meat with a plastic spoon it was that tender. Well done! Great wine list.

We really enjoyed eating at this contemporary and exciting restaurant. Great atmosphere and excellent service. As English tourists, Sebastiaan and the other staff went out of their way to make us feel welcome. They wereextremely charming and helpful. The steaks were delicious. We loved Amsterdam.

column3: Nice and modern place with great food
column4: Ended up there on brunch/lunch. We didn't order much, just their open sandwiches, smoked chicken and avocado one, and tartare steak. They were delicious and enough for light lunch. In other case, order something else. Prices are reasonable, meat meals were a bit pricier.

Had a really nice meal here whilst staying in Amsterdam on business. Can't fault this place at all. Thecstsff were friendly and the atmosphere great. I chose the steak for my main course and it was cooked to perfection. Highly recommended
Being situated in a good location this restaurant offered us such a good chance to have delicious lunch for a good price.

Had dinner here while on holiday and the food was good. My husband's hamburger was large and cooked medium well to perfection. The restaurant is nice and modern and clean inside. The staff was friendly but could be more attentive.
Ate here our on Saturday in between visiting museums. It was a good option, good burger, good customer service. Would visit again!

Perfect decision in terms of place for drinking with friends and having dinner at the same time. The staff is too kind and the food quality is outstanding especially the meat. Definitely, it's a highly recommended place.

Turned up without a reservation and we were very warmly greeted, the staff were very accommodating and the restaurant is very nicely decorated. We both had the rib eye which was excellent, would definitely return.

We stopped in as this was close to our hotel, and in spite of us not booking they found space for us at the bar. The burgers were delicious, as was the ribeye steak, and all were cooked to our individual tastes. Good stuff!
Very good beef, side dishes ok, reasonable wine list, enthusiast staff. Proven concept, for some reason less crowded than the adjacent seafood place.

column3: Best steak I've ever had in my life
column4: Ordered a Flat Iron Steak, it was perfectly cooked and extremely juicy. The staff were friendly and the service was good. Highly recommended!
Stopped by after a visit to the Van Gogh Museum. Ordered burgers which were on the drier end. Fries were out of this world. Service was friendly!

column3: Excellent Place, food, wine and fair price
column4: a good variety of food with nice place, with some good yet affordable wines. better book your table ahead as it is always very crowded even on weekdays
Nice enough food, cool relaxed interior, slow but very friendly service. Food was nice although portions weren't the biggest.

column3: Great place good food friendly staff
column4: Ended up here as place we were going was full, but good decision! Food excellent, very friendly service and personal attention. Will go back, and will recommend it.
Friendly environment, really good food... the meat was charcoalgrilled and tasty. Staff serviceminded and friendly.
Beat meat place so far in Amsterdam , nice service , very knowledge about they wine and nice atmosphere , a little food smoke in the place

column3: A delightful find! Great service, great space, great food
column4: We were delighted to stumble on this smart restaurant near main upmarket shopping street. We so enjoyed lunch we booked to return for dinner a few nights later.
If you want a good steak in an elegant setting, this is the place. But forget the Carpaccio and if you want a desert order twice over, even if you are on a diet.
This restaurant is really nice. The staff are friendly and helpful, the steaks are delicious. The price is good too. We had a lovely intimate candle lit dinner here.
We were a Group of 9 Some of us got hamburger and Beer Good meat. Nice enviroment. Techno furniture. Good Service. Avarage price 30 euro.
Excellent steak. Get the gin and tonic creations from the menu, rib eye, and the cabbage side. The hamburger is really good too. Best steak in the area in my opinion!
Although our hotel recommended a restaurant next door, when we arrived we chose The Uptown Meat Club instead. So glad we did! The food was amazing!

A nice place for after dinner drinks... particularly if you like GIN. Didn't try the food here - better to go to the seafood bar next door (which is excellent!) Helpful service... not sure about all the cow-related decor, particularly if you are ordering beef!
Stopped by a lunch time for a couple of beers. Sat outside and people watched everybody whizzing along on bikes. Nice bar. Worth a visit.
The food is very good but the portions are small. Nice atmosphere but not suited for kids. The service is friendly.

Very trendy cool bar and restaurant, i would recommend booking as when we arrived at 1800 they were all ready fully booked but managed to squeeze us in. We were served the best burger we have ever eaten

The atmosphere was warm and welcoming. Drinks were a nice size pour and the fresh mint tea delicious. Don't miss the carpaccio starter it's delicious. The wait staff is eager to please the customers. If you like meaty meals try this one out

Very nice food. Tasty and well served. The staff was very friendly. The wine amazing and the atmosphere very friendly. Elegant tastes and a very tasty chocolate sweet to close the night. I would highly recomend it.
We tried Uptown Meal Club at our hotel's suggestion. We had a terrific dinner with excellent service. My wife and I particularly enjoyed the pork pita appetizer, as well as our steak entrees.

column3: Good but not excellent and very pricy
column4: Altogether good but far too expensive for the overall experience. Rib eye was ok whilst entrecote was too fat. Dessert was pretentious but not mind-blowing. Will head for another meat place next time!
